original: tsvi'i don las ta dbyi ba 'ang ngo //
analyzed: tsvi'i don las ta dbyi ba 'ang ngo //

original: d'a tsa lo hi ta las kya sha'o //
analyzed: d'a tsa lo hi ta las kya sha'o //

analyzed: ni dr'a sogs las ma tu ba dbyi ba'ang ngo //

analyzed: ro mantha las skyugs ldad byed pa la'o //

analyzed: su kha sogs las yang dag par rig pa la'o //

original: shabda sogs las byed pa la'o //
analyzed: shabda sogs las byed pa la'o //

original: ta pas las kya tsa'o //
analyzed: ta pas las kya tsa'o //

original: tsi trang las ngo mtshar ba la'o //

analyzed: ka ya sogs las ya ka'o //

original: de'i ched du byed pa po gcig pa las 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: de'i ched du byed pa po gcig pa las 'dod pa la'o //
translated: For that purpose, from one who is the agent, in desire.

original: ru tsa dang shu bha min pa'i aa tsa gcig pa hal dang po las shin tu dang yang yang la yang'o //
analyzed: ru tsa dang shu bha min pa'i aa tsa gcig pa hal dang po las shin tu dang yang yang la yang'o //
translated: From one who is not Ruca and Shubha, from one who is Acā, from Hal, from the first, from very much, and again and again.

original: ri s'u tri m'u tri s'u tsi aat aa sha a'urnu rnams las so //
analyzed: ri s'u tri m'u tri s'u tsi aat aa sha a'urnu rnams las so //
translated: From Ri, Su, Tri, Mu, Tri, Su, Ci, A, Ta, A, Śa, Urṇu, and so on.

original: 'gro ba'i don las 'khyog po kho na la'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don las 'khyog po kho na la'o //
translated: From the crooked one, only for the sake of going.

original: gri lu pa sa da tsa ra dza pa dza bha da ha da sha las smad pa la'o //
analyzed: gri lu pa sa da tsa ra dza pa dza bha da ha da sha las smad pa la'o //
translated: From Gri, Lu, Pa, Da, Ca, Ra, Ja, Pa, Ja, Bha, Dha, Ha, Da, Śa, the last.

original: k'as dang @151b a'as dang nga ya dang aa ya wip aa tsa gcig min pa las lit la a'am gyi rjes su krinya bh'u aa sti lit 'ang pha rol lo //
analyzed: k'as dang @151b a'as dang nga ya dang aa ya wip aa tsa gcig min pa las lit la a'am gyi rjes su krinya bh'u aa sti lit 'ang pha rol lo //
translated: From Ka, Ī, Ṇ, Ya, A, Ya, Vi, Pa, A, Ca, not one, from Li, Ta, La, A, after, Kṛi, Ṇ, Bhū, A, Śi, Li, Ta, the other side.

original: ritstsha a'urnu min pa'i aitsa dang po lci ba ldan pa las so //
analyzed: ritstsha a'urnu min pa'i aitsa dang po lci ba ldan pa las so //
translated: From I, Ca, the first, not Ri, Ū, Ṇu, endowed with heaviness.

original: dz'a gri dang ausha las yang na'o //
analyzed: dz'a gri dang ausha las yang na'o //
translated: From Ja, Grī, and Uṣṇa, again.

original: bh'i hr'i bhri h'u rnams kyi shnu bzhin yang ngo //
analyzed: bh'i hr'i bhri h'u rnams kyi shnu bzhin yang ngo //
translated: From Bhī, Hṛī, and Bhru, Ū, the same as Śaṇ.

original: batti / lam kita'o //
analyzed: batti / lam kita'o //
translated: Batti, Lam, Kit.

original: lota la krinya'ang de'i pha rol lo //
analyzed: lota la krinya'ang de'i pha rol lo //
translated: From Lo, Ta, La, Kṛi, Ṇ, also the other side of that.

original: de las la ni 'jig go //
analyzed: de las la ni 'jig go //
translated: From that, La, Ni, is destroyed.

original: sya t'as dag li lut dag la'o //🔽lung las tsa'o //
analyzed: sya t'as dag li lut dag la'o // lung las tsa'o //
translated: The affix tasi is added to the roots syat and lut.🔽The affix ta is added to the roots lun and kṣa.

original: spri sha smi kri sha tri pa dri ba las yang na'o //
analyzed: spri sha smi kri sha tri pa dri ba las yang na'o //
translated: The affix tasi is added to the roots priśa, smika, kṛṣa, and pada.

original: tan sogs rnams las ta th'as dag la 'jig go //
analyzed: tan sogs rnams las ta th'as dag la 'jig go //
translated: The affix ta is added to the roots tan and so on.

original: ghr'atstsh'a sh'a dhe s'a las aa tad la'o //
analyzed: ghr'atstsh'a sh'a dhe s'a las aa tad la'o //
translated: The affix ta is added to the roots ghra, cchā, śādhe, and sā.

original: dhisth'a g'a ti bi ba bh'u rnams las so //
analyzed: dhisth'a g'a ti bi ba bh'u rnams las so //
translated: The affix ta is added to the roots sthā, gā, gati, and vibhavu.

original: sha la aika mtha' nye dri sha min pa las ksa ste ait med pa las so //
analyzed: sha la aika mtha' nye dri sha min pa las ksa ste ait med pa las so //
translated: The affix ka is added to the root śala when it ends in e and is not followed by the word dṛśa.

original: shli sha las so //
analyzed: shli sha las so //
translated: The affix ka is added to the root śliśa.

original: sems can 'khyud pa la'o //
analyzed: sems can 'khyud pa la'o //
translated: The affix ka is added to the root sattva when it means embracing sentient beings.

original: ni shri dru sru kam las byed pa po la tsang 'o //
analyzed: ni shri dru sru kam las byed pa po la tsang 'o //
translated: The affix ka is added to the root niśrī when it means to do.

original: dhe shvi las yang na'o //
analyzed: dhe shvi las yang na'o //
translated: The affix ka is added to the root deśvī.

original: ri sri sh'as aa su khy'a batsa las aad 'o //
analyzed: ri sri sh'as aa su khy'a batsa las aad 'o //
translated: The affix ka is added to the root riśrī when it means to go to heaven.

original: hv'a lib sa tsi las so //
analyzed: hv'a lib sa tsi las so //
translated: The affix ka is added to the root havlī.

original: tad la yang na'o //
analyzed: tad la yang na'o //
translated: The affix ka is added to the root tan.

original: lita 'gro ba dang dyut ra dha sha ma sogs las aa tang la'o //🔽rnams las so //
analyzed: lita 'gro ba dang dyut ra dha sha ma sogs las aa tang la'o // rnams las so //
translated: The affix ka is added to the root lit when it means to go and to the root dyutrā when it means to go to heaven.

original: air 'gro ba las yang na'o //🔽rnams las so //
analyzed: air 'gro ba las yang na'o // rnams las so //
translated: The affix ka is added to the root ir when it means to go.

original: tsin ta la pa da sri dza las so //
analyzed: tsin ta la pa da sri dza las so //
translated: The affix ka is added to the root cin when it means to go.

original: by'a ya las yang na'o //
analyzed: by'a ya las yang na'o //
translated: The affix ka is added to the root vyā when it means to go.

original: du ha aatsa las byed pa po la'o //
analyzed: du ha aatsa las byed pa po la'o //
translated: The affix ḍha is added to the agent.

original: ru dha las ma yin no //
analyzed: ru dha las ma yin no //
translated: The affix ṇa is not added.

original: ta pa las aa nu t'a pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: ta pa las aa nu t'a pa la yang ngo //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the word anutāpa.

original: dngos po dang las dag la'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang las dag la'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the words bhāva and karma.

original: ta las 'jig go //
analyzed: ta las 'jig go //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the word kṣaya.

original: kun 'gro la yaka'o //🔽tra pa las las la ta pa las so //
analyzed: kun 'gro la yaka'o // tra pa las las la ta pa las so //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the word sarvatraga.🔽The affix ṇa is added to the word karma.

original: bya ba'i gzhi'i las la byed pa po nyid la las bzhin no //
analyzed: bya ba'i gzhi'i las la byed pa po nyid la las bzhin no //
translated: The agent is like the object with regard to the basis of the action.

original: ku shi dang ranydzi las shyan dang pa rasmee'i tshig yang na'o //
analyzed: ku shi dang ranydzi las shyan dang pa rasmee'i tshig yang na'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the words kuśa and nadi.

original: du ha las yaka ma yin no //
analyzed: du ha las yaka ma yin no //
translated: The affix ṇa is not added to the word duha.

original: br'u dang ki ra ti snun ma rgyan gyi don dang shri shrantha granthi ni san rnams la tsina'ang ngo //
analyzed: br'u dang ki ra ti snun ma rgyan gyi don dang shri shrantha granthi ni san rnams la tsina'ang ngo //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the words brū, kirati, and śrīśraṃsthagranthī.

original: byed pa po la shaba'o //
analyzed: byed pa po la shaba'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the agent.

original: ni las so //
analyzed: ni las so //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the object.

original: aad sogs las 'jig go //
analyzed: aad sogs las 'jig go //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the words ādya and so on.

original: yang las mang po la'o //
analyzed: yang las mang po la'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to many objects.

original: dzu ho ti sogs las shnu'o //
analyzed: dzu ho ti sogs las shnu'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the words juhoti and so on.

original: dib sogs las shyan 'o //
analyzed: dib sogs las shyan 'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the words diś and so on.

original: la sha las yang na'o //
analyzed: la sha las yang na'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the word laśa.

original: yas las so //
analyzed: yas las so //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the word yasa.

original: yam las so //🔽tud sogs rnams las sha'o //
analyzed: yam las so // tud sogs rnams las sha'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the word yama.🔽The affix ṇa is added to the words tu and so on.

original: ru dha sogs rnams la shnama'o //
analyzed: ru dha sogs rnams la shnama'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to the words rudha and so on.

original: tan sogs las au'o //🔽su @152a * //
analyzed: tan sogs las au'o // su @152a * //
translated: from tan, etc., au.

original: sogs rnams las shnu'o //
analyzed: sogs rnams las shnu'o //
translated: from su, etc., śanu.

original: shru kri pa dhe ba rnams kyi shri kri dhi yang ngo //
analyzed: shru kri pa dhe ba rnams kyi shri kri dhi yang ngo //
translated: from śru, kṛ, pad, and deva, śrikṛti.

original: auk'i khas yang na'o //🔽te ksha las phra mor byed pa la'o //🔽kr'i sogs rnams las shnu'o //
analyzed: auk'i khas yang na'o // te ksha las phra mor byed pa la'o // kr'i sogs rnams las shnu'o //
translated: from uka, kṣa, and ya, kṣa.🔽from kara, etc., śanu.

original: rnams las shnu yang ngo //
analyzed: rnams las shnu yang ngo //
translated: from śru, kṛ, and pad, śrukṛti.

original: hal las hi ya sh'a na tsa'o //
analyzed: hal las hi ya sh'a na tsa'o //
translated: from hal, hyaśana.

original: zhes pa legs so grags pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs dang po'i rkang pa gnyis pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: zhes pa legs so grags pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs dang po'i rkang pa gnyis pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the second line of the first chapter of the Mañjuśrī grammar of proper sounds.

original: // / byung ba la lung'o //
analyzed: // / byung ba la lung'o //
translated: In the case of bhū, the optative is ṅa.

original: shru sad pas las yit yang na'o //
analyzed: shru sad pas las yit yang na'o //
translated: From śru, the optative is yita.

original: de ring ma yin pa la de brjod 'dod ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: de ring ma yin pa la de brjod 'dod ma yin pa la'o //
translated: In the case of not today, the optative is yad-icchā.

original: lang'o // dran par byed pa'i don la yata min pa la lrita'o //
analyzed: lang'o // dran par byed pa'i don la yata min pa la lrita'o //
translated: In the sense of remembering, the optative is lṛt.

original: 'dod pa la yang na'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa la yang na'o //
translated: In the case of desire, the optative is na.

original: ha dang sha shva las lang'o //
analyzed: ha dang sha shva las lang'o //
translated: From ha, śa, and śva, the optative is na.

original: pa ro ksha la yang na'o //🔽dus nye bar dri ba la'ong ngo //
analyzed: pa ro ksha la yang na'o // dus nye bar dri ba la'ong ngo //
translated: In the case of parokṣa, the optative is na.

original: yul du byas pa la'o //
analyzed: yul du byas pa la'o //
translated: In the case of a question about time, the optative is ṅa.🔽In the case of an object, the optative is ṅa.

original: lita'o // shin tu gsang ba la'o //
analyzed: lita'o // shin tu gsang ba la'o //
translated: In the case of a very secret matter, the optative is lṛt.

original: sv'a ba sogs dus la aasmad la'o //
analyzed: sv'a ba sogs dus la aasmad la'o //
translated: Sva, etc. , in the sense of time, and in the sense of asmad.

original: pa roksha ma yi smam lata'o //
analyzed: pa roksha ma yi smam lata'o //
translated: Paroksha in the sense of samala.

original: byung ba la na nu dri ba'i lan la'o //
analyzed: byung ba la na nu dri ba'i lan la'o //
translated: Nanu in the sense of utpatti and in the sense of answer.

original: na dang nu las yang na'o //
analyzed: na dang nu las yang na'o //
translated: Nu and nu in the sense of again.

original: bu ra la lung yang na ste sma ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: bu ra la lung yang na ste sma ma yin pa la'o //
translated: Bhu in the sense of scripture and in the sense of not beard.

original: da ltar ba la lata'o //
analyzed: da ltar ba la lata'o //
translated: Lat in the sense of present.

original: de dang nye ba'ang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: de dang nye ba'ang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: Tat in the sense of near.

original: 'dod par byed pa la byung ba bzhin yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dod par byed pa la byung ba bzhin yang ngo //
translated: In the sense of desire, like in the sense of utpatti.

original: myur bar brjod pa la lrita'o //
analyzed: myur bar brjod pa la lrita'o //
translated: Lrit in the sense of swift.

original: 'dod pa'i tshig la linga'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i tshig la linga'o //
translated: Ling in the sense of word of desire.

original: aa dya ta na ma yin pa bya ba rab tu bcings pa nye ba dag la min no //
analyzed: aa dya ta na ma yin pa bya ba rab tu bcings pa nye ba dag la min no //
translated: Min in the sense of not adhyatana, in the sense of action, and in the sense of bondage.

original: bh'a bi ni gzhan la mtshams brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: bh'a bi ni gzhan la mtshams brjod pa la'o //
translated: Bhavi in the sense of expressing the limit of another.

original: dus kyi nyin mtshan min pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dus kyi nyin mtshan min pa'i 'o //
translated: Not in the sense of time, day, or night.

original: bar lang yang na'o //
analyzed: bar lang yang na'o //
translated: Vara in the sense of again.

original: ling la bya ba shor ba la lrid 'o //
analyzed: ling la bya ba shor ba la lrid 'o //
translated: Lrit in the sense of the loss of action.

original: she sha'i bar las byung ba la yang na'o //🔽smad pa la ka thi la ling 'o //
analyzed: she sha'i bar las byung ba la yang na'o // smad pa la ka thi la ling 'o //
translated: Vara in the sense of arising from the interval.🔽Ling in the sense of censure.

original: aa pi dang dz'a tu la yang lata'o //
analyzed: aa pi dang dz'a tu la yang lata'o //
translated: Lat in the sense of api and jatu.

original: ki dang ka ta ra dang ka ta ma rnams la ling lrit dag go //
analyzed: ki dang ka ta ra dang ka ta ma rnams la ling lrit dag go //
translated: The words kī, katarā, and katamā have the forms liṅ and liṭ.

original: mi bzod pa dang mi srid pa dag la'o //🔽kim ki la dang yod pa'i don dag la lrita'o //🔽yang ya di ya d'a dz'a tu rnams la ling'o //
analyzed: mi bzod pa dang mi srid pa dag la'o // kim ki la dang yod pa'i don dag la lrita'o // yang ya di ya d'a dz'a tu rnams la ling'o //
translated: They are used for “cannot” and “impossible.”🔽The words kim and kiṃ kila have the form liṭ.🔽The words yady, yadā, and jātu have the form liṅ.

original: yatstsha dang ya tri dag las smad pa la'o //
analyzed: yatstsha dang ya tri dag las smad pa la'o //
translated: The words yacchā and yatra are used for “below.”

original: ngo mtshar ba la'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar ba la'o //
translated: They are used for “amazing.”

original: lhag ma la lrata'o //
analyzed: lhag ma la lrata'o //
translated: The rest have the form liṭ.

original: ya di la lid 'o //
analyzed: ya di la lid 'o //
translated: Yady has the form liṅ.

original: auta dang aa bi dag las shin tu 'i don la'o //
analyzed: auta dang aa bi dag las shin tu 'i don la'o //
translated: The words uta and api have the form su for “very.”

original: 'dod pa rab tu tshor ba la katstsita min pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa rab tu tshor ba la katstsita min pa la'o //
translated: They are used for “sometimes” in the sense of “feeling desire.”

original: srid pa dang nus pa'i @152b don la de'i ched kyi don rab tu sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: srid pa dang nus pa'i @152b don la de'i ched kyi don rab tu sbyor ba la'o //
translated: They are used for “possibility” and “ability” in the sense of “for that purpose.”

original: yang min pa'i byings brjod pa la yang na'o //
analyzed: yang min pa'i byings brjod pa la yang na'o //
translated: The word api is also used for “not.”

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag la'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag la'o //
translated: They are used for “cause” and “effect.”

original: 'dod pa'i don rnams las da ltar ba la'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don rnams las da ltar ba la'o //
translated: They are used for “now” among desired objects.

original: de rnams la lot 'ang ste 'dod pa rab tu tshor bar byed pa la'o //
analyzed: de rnams la lot 'ang ste 'dod pa rab tu tshor bar byed pa la'o //
translated: They are used for “making desire feel good.”

original: cho ga dang dri ba dang don gnyer ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: cho ga dang dri ba dang don gnyer ba rnams la'o //
translated: They are used for “ritual,” “question,” and “purpose.”

original: lota'o // bsgo ba khas len dus la bab pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: lota'o // bsgo ba khas len dus la bab pa rnams la'o //
translated: LOTA. To those who have accepted the order.

original: a'urdva moo h'u rti ga la ling yang ngo //
analyzed: a'urdva moo h'u rti ga la ling yang ngo //
translated: AURDHA MOHURTIKALALINGA.

original: sma la lot 'o //
analyzed: sma la lot 'o //
translated: SMALA LOTA.

original: lhag par tshol ba la'o //
analyzed: lhag par tshol ba la'o //
translated: To the one who seeks more.

original: k'a la sa ma ya be l'a rnams la yata la linga'o //
analyzed: k'a la sa ma ya be l'a rnams la yata la linga'o //
translated: KALASAMAYAVELAS to YAT LALINGA.

original: 'os pa dang nus pa dag las so //
analyzed: 'os pa dang nus pa dag las so //
translated: From the proper and the possible.

original: 'byung 'gyur la lrita'o //
analyzed: 'byung 'gyur la lrita'o //
translated: To the future, LTRITA.

original: de ring ma yin pa la lut'o //
analyzed: de ring ma yin pa la lut'o //
translated: To that which is not today, LUTA.

original: bu r'a dang y'a bata dang mi zad pa la lata'o //
analyzed: bu r'a dang y'a bata dang mi zad pa la lata'o //
translated: To the son, the grandson, and the inexhaustible, LATA.

original: ka d'a dang karti las yang na'o //
analyzed: ka d'a dang karti las yang na'o //
translated: From KADA and KARTI, YANA.

original: ki dang ka ta ra dang ka ta ma rnams la byug 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: ki dang ka ta ra dang ka ta ma rnams la byug 'dod pa la'o //
translated: To K and KATARA and KATAMARA, the one who desires to anoint.

original: 'bras bu brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu brjod pa la'o //
translated: To the expression of the result.

original: lo ta'i don dang mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: lo ta'i don dang mtshan nyid do //
translated: The meaning and characteristic of LOTA.🔽AURDHA MOHURTIKALALINGA.

original: a'urdhva mo h'urttika la ling 'ang ngo //🔽m'ang la lung'o //
analyzed: a'urdhva mo h'urttika la ling 'ang ngo // m'ang la lung'o //
translated: To the grandson, LUNA.

original: smra pha rol la lang'o //
analyzed: smra pha rol la lang'o //
translated: To the other side of speech, LANA.

original: zhes pa s'a dhu k'irti'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs dang po'i rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs so /🔽// / la'i 'o //
analyzed: zhes pa s'a dhu k'irti'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs dang po'i rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs so /🔽// / la'i 'o //
translated: Thus ends the third verse of the first chapter in the Mañjuśrī grammar called The Expression of Sounds.

original: gcig gnyis mang po rnams la'o byed pa po la ti ba tas aanti'o//
analyzed: gcig gnyis mang po rnams la'o byed pa po la ti ba tas aanti'o//
translated: The affix ṭi is added to the agent of one, two, and many.

original: yushmad la si ba thas tha'o //🔽aa smad la mip  bas mas 'o //
analyzed: yushmad la si ba thas tha'o // aa smad la mip  bas mas 'o //
translated: The affix stha is added to yugaṃ.🔽The affix ma is added to asmin.

original: ngeta las t'a t'a ma aanta //
analyzed: ngeta las t'a t'a ma aanta //
translated: The affix ta is added to ne.🔽The affix tha is added to tāṃ.🔽The affix ḍha is added to āṃ.🔽The affix ma is added to i.

original: th'a sa a'a th'am dh'a ma ait pa hi ma him snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: th'a sa a'a th'am dh'a ma ait pa hi ma him snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The affix ha is added to hi.

original: 'gro ba dang 'tshe ba dang / sgra'i don min pa'i ha sa la brje ba la'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'tshe ba dang / sgra'i don min pa'i ha sa la brje ba la'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to ha, which does not mean going or violence or sound.

original: trinya las 'gro ba dang de'i ngang tshul la'o//
analyzed: trinya las 'gro ba dang de'i ngang tshul la'o//
translated: The affix ṇa is added to triṃ.

original: nye ra bsgyur ni las bi sha las so //🔽bi ba r'a dag la dzi las so //
analyzed: nye ra bsgyur ni las bi sha las so // bi ba r'a dag la dzi las so //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to viśa.🔽The affix ṇa is added to vibhraṃ.

original: pa ri bi aab las kr'i las so //🔽a'ad las d'a las rang gi gdangs pa ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: pa ri bi aab las kr'i las so // a'ad las d'a las rang gi gdangs pa ma yin pa la'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to paribhava.🔽The affix ṇa is added to ā.

original: ga mi la sa bzod pa la'o //
analyzed: ga mi la sa bzod pa la'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to kṣama.

original: nu la bratstsha las so //🔽aa nu pa ri dag la kr'i da las kyang ngo ;🔽; sam las k'u dza na min pa las so //
analyzed: nu la bratstsha las so // aa nu pa ri dag la kr'i da las kyang ngo ; ; sam las k'u dza na min pa las so //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to bṛṃśa.🔽The affix ṇa is added to anu.🔽The affix ṇa is added to kṛ.

original: aa pa las skr'i las so //
analyzed: aa pa las skr'i las so //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to apa.🔽The affix ṇa is added to stha.🔽The affix ṇa is added to śava.

original: sman pa la n'a tha las so //🔽sha ba las mna' la'o //
analyzed: sman pa la n'a tha las so //🔽sha ba las mna' la'o //
translated: The affix ṇa is added to mān.

original: dam bca' dang sthe ya dang nye bar gnas pa dang rab tu gsal ba rnams la sth'a las so //
analyzed: dam bca' dang sthe ya dang nye bar gnas pa dang rab tu gsal ba rnams la sth'a las so //
translated: The words sthā, sthāyā, upasthā, and prakaṭa are formed from sthā.

original: sam bi pra aa ba las so //🔽auta @153a * //🔽las gyen du ma yin par spyod pa la'o //
analyzed: sam bi pra aa ba las so // auta @153a * // las gyen du ma yin par spyod pa la'o //
translated: The word sam is formed from vibhū.🔽The word ut is formed from ūrdhva.

original: au pa las lha mchod ba la'o //
analyzed: au pa las lha mchod ba la'o //
translated: The word upa is formed from ūrdhva.🔽The word sam is formed from man.

original: sngags kyis so //
analyzed: sngags kyis so //
translated: The word sam is formed from mantra.

original: pa tha la rjes su 'jug pa dag la'o //🔽byug pa 'dod pa la yang na'o //
analyzed: pa tha la rjes su 'jug pa dag la'o // byug pa 'dod pa la yang na'o //
translated: The words sam and anuvṛtti are formed from pada.

original: las med pa las so //
analyzed: las med pa las so //
translated: The word an is formed from anulepana.🔽The word sama is formed from akarma.

original: sa ma las gam ritstsha britstsha svam  shru be ti //
analyzed: sa ma las gam ritstsha britstsha svam  shru be ti //
translated: The words sama, ric, bricc, svāhā, and śubha are formed from sama.

original: aarti dri sha las so //
analyzed: aarti dri sha las so //
translated: The word artha is formed from dṛś.🔽The word ād is formed from yama.

original: a'ad las ya ma han las rang gi yan lag gi las can las so //🔽aud bi dag la ta ba las so //
analyzed: a'ad las ya ma han las rang gi yan lag gi las can las so // aud bi dag la ta ba las so //
translated: The word ud is formed from ātma.

original: ta ba las las la'o //
analyzed: ta ba las las la'o //
translated: The word tāva is formed from karma.

original: ni sam bi au pa rnams las hva las so //
analyzed: ni sam bi au pa rnams las hva las so //
translated: The words ni, sam, and upa are formed from ha.

original: a'ang las 'gran pa la'o //
analyzed: a'ang las 'gran pa la'o //
translated: The word āṅ is formed from spardhā.

original: s'u tsa na aa pa ksha pa na ;
analyzed: s'u tsa na aa pa ksha pa na ;
translated: The words su, cana, apa, kṣapa,

original: se b'a s'a ha sa yatna ka tha au pa yo ga rnams la krinya las so //
analyzed: se b'a s'a ha sa yatna ka tha au pa yo ga rnams la krinya las so //
translated: and sevana are formed from kṛt.

original: aa dhi las zil gyis gnon pa la'o //
analyzed: aa dhi las zil gyis gnon pa la'o //
translated: The word adhi is formed from abhibhava.

original: bi las sgra'i las la'o //
analyzed: bi las sgra'i las la'o //
translated: The suffix -i is added to the root vi, to mean 'action'.

original: las med pa las so //
analyzed: las med pa las so //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the root vi, to mean 'without action'.

original: p'u dz'a aut+sam ga / au pa na ya na dzny'a na //
analyzed: p'u dz'a aut+sam ga / au pa na ya na dzny'a na //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the roots pūjā, utsāha, upa, nayana, jñāna,

original: bhri ti bya ya bi ga na na rnams la b'i las so //
analyzed: bhri ti bya ya bi ga na na rnams la b'i las so //
translated: bhṛti, vyaya, and viṣaya.

original: kartri stha aa m'urtta las las la'o //
analyzed: kartri stha aa m'urtta las las la'o //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the root kartṛ, to mean 'without a body'.

original: aa pa hnu ba dzny'a las so //
analyzed: aa pa hnu ba dzny'a las so //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the root apahan, to mean 'without knowledge'.

original: las med pa las so //
analyzed: las med pa las so //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the root apa, to mean 'without action'.

original: sam pra ti las mi dran pa la'o //
analyzed: sam pra ti las mi dran pa la'o //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the root samprati, to mean 'without memory'.

original: dzny'a na bh'a sa na yatna /🔽au pa sh'ant'a na bi ma ti //
analyzed: dzny'a na bh'a sa na yatna / au pa sh'ant'a na bi ma ti //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the roots jñāna, bhāṣaṇa, yatna,🔽upaśānta, and vimati.

original: au patstshandan rnams la pa da las so //
analyzed: au patstshandan rnams la pa da las so //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the roots upa, cchanda, and upa, śānti.

original: gsal bar brjod pa la aa nu las las med pa las so ;
analyzed: gsal bar brjod pa la aa nu las las med pa las so ;
translated: The suffix -a is added to the root anu, to mean 'without action'.

original: ; lhan cig go //
analyzed: ; lhan cig go //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the root vi, to mean 'together'.

original: bi pra ti patti la yang na'o //
analyzed: bi pra ti patti la yang na'o //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the root vipatti, to mean 'again'.

original: nyer bsgyur las a'u ha dang aa sya ti las so //🔽pritti aut+s'a ha t'a ya na rnams la kra ma las so //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur las a'u ha dang aa sya ti las so // pritti aut+s'a ha t'a ya na rnams la kra ma las so //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the roots āha and asya, to mean 'action'.🔽The suffix -a is added to the roots prīti, utsāha, and ātman, to mean 'in order'.

original: au pa ba r'a dag las so //
analyzed: au pa ba r'a dag las so //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the roots upa and vara.

original: bi las rkang pa dag gis so //
analyzed: bi las rkang pa dag gis so //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the root vi, to mean 'by foot'.

original: pra au pa las rtsom pa la'o //
analyzed: pra au pa las rtsom pa la'o //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the root upa, to mean 'beginning'.

original: dzyo ti aungga ti la a'ad las so //
analyzed: dzyo ti aungga ti la a'ad las so //
translated: The suffix -a is added to the roots jyoti and aṅga.

original: nyer bsgyur med pa las yang na'o //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur med pa las yang na'o //
translated: From the indeclinable aṅga, again.

original: aa pa las gir ti las so //
analyzed: aa pa las gir ti las so //
translated: From apa, girati, to go.

original: sam las dam 'cha' la'o //
analyzed: sam las dam 'cha' la'o //
translated: From saṃ, dam, to promise.

original: aud las tsar las dang bcas pa las so //
analyzed: aud las tsar las dang bcas pa las so //
translated: From ud, car, to have, and from sahabhu, together with.

original: sam las gsum pa ldan pa las so //
analyzed: sam las gsum pa ldan pa las so //
translated: From saṃ, the third, samprayukta, to be associated.

original: cho ga ma yin pa las dan'a las so //
analyzed: cho ga ma yin pa las dan'a las so //
translated: From akriyā, dāna, to give.

original: au pa ya ma las rang gir byed pa la'o //
analyzed: au pa ya ma las rang gir byed pa la'o //
translated: From upa, yāma, to take for oneself.

original: tad gi rgyu mtshan las aam las krinya las so //
analyzed: tad gi rgyu mtshan las aam las krinya las so //
translated: From tad, nimitta, aṅka, to mark.

original: san las so //
analyzed: san las so //
translated: From saṃ, to be.

original: rang gi don la ji ltar bklags pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi don la ji ltar bklags pa'o //
translated: One should read as in one’s own purpose.

original: smri dri sha las so //
analyzed: smri dri sha las so //
translated: From smṛtiśāstra, to remember.

original: aa nu min pa las dzny'a las so //🔽pra ti dang a'ad min pa las shu las so//
analyzed: aa nu min pa las dzny'a las so // pra ti dang a'ad min pa las shu las so//
translated: From anūna, jñāna, to know.🔽From prati and ā, śu, to be pure.

original: @153b sha di las shita:la'o //
analyzed: @153b sha di las shita:la'o //
translated: From ṣaṇ, śita, to be cool.

original: mring las lung ling dag kyang las so //
analyzed: mring las lung ling dag kyang las so //
translated: From mṛdu, to be soft.

original: nyer bsgyur las aatsa dang po dang aatsa'i mtha' las yu dzi las mchod sbyin gyi snod rnams la ma yin no //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur las aatsa dang po dang aatsa'i mtha' las yu dzi las mchod sbyin gyi snod rnams la ma yin no //
translated: From the indeclinable aṅga, the first, and the final aṅga, yuj, to be offered, are not for the vessels of sacrifice.

original: sa ma las kshnu las so //
analyzed: sa ma las kshnu las so //
translated: From saṃ, kṣaṇa, to be momentary.

original: bhu dza las skyong byed ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: bhu dza las skyong byed ma yin pa la'o //
translated: From bhuja, to be a protector.

original: ni las ni min ba la las gang la de gal te byed pa po bsam bya ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: ni las ni min ba la las gang la de gal te byed pa po bsam bya ma yin pa la'o //
translated: ṇi is for karma, and ṇi is for that which is not karma.

original: bh'ishmi las sbyor ba po las bha yasma ya la'o //
analyzed: bh'ishmi las sbyor ba po las bha yasma ya la'o //
translated: bhi is for the agent, and bhaya is for the object.

original: gri dhi panytsa las bslu ba la'o //
analyzed: gri dhi panytsa las bslu ba la'o //
translated: gri is for the five, and dhi is for deception.

original: l'i las n+ya ka byed pa dang mchod pa dag la'o //🔽mi thy'e sbyor ba la krinya las yang yang la'o //
analyzed: l'i las n+ya ka byed pa dang mchod pa dag la'o // mi thy'e sbyor ba la krinya las yang yang la'o //
translated: li is for nyāka, and li is for the doer and the worshipper.🔽mithyā is for the combination, and kṛt is for again and again.

original: nya 'gro ba las kyang byed pa po las svam ste gal te bya ba'i 'bras bu la'o //
analyzed: nya 'gro ba las kyang byed pa po las svam ste gal te bya ba'i 'bras bu la'o //
translated: na is for the goer, and sva is for the agent.

original: aa pa las pa dag las so //
analyzed: aa pa las pa dag las so //
translated: apa is for the non-existent.

original: sam auta a'ata rnams las ya mi las gzhung min pa la'o //
analyzed: sam auta a'ata rnams las ya mi las gzhung min pa la'o //
translated: saṃ, uta, and āt are for yami, which is for the non-scriptural.

original: nyer bsgyur med pa'i dzny'a las so //🔽tshig gi khyad par rtogs pa la yang na'o //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur med pa'i dzny'a las so // tshig gi khyad par rtogs pa la yang na'o //
translated: jñā is for the non-afflicted.🔽na is for the understanding of the particular words.

original: aa nu pa r'a dag las krinya las ma yin no //
analyzed: aa nu pa r'a dag las krinya las ma yin no //
translated: anu is for the non-existent.

original: pra ti aa bhi aa ti las kshi pa las so //
analyzed: pra ti aa bhi aa ti las kshi pa las so //
translated: prati, abhi, and ati are for kṣip.

original: pra las ba ha las so //🔽pa ri las mrisha las kyang ngo //
analyzed: pra las ba ha las so // pa ri las mrisha las kyang ngo //
translated: pra is for vaha.🔽pari is for mṛṣā.

original: bi a'ad las ra ma las kyang ngo //
analyzed: bi a'ad las ra ma las kyang ngo //
translated: vi is for ād, and ra is for mā.

original: au pa las so //
analyzed: au pa las so //
translated: upa is for the existent.

original: las med pa las yang na'o //
analyzed: las med pa las yang na'o //
translated: From the negative, again.

original: nam min pa la sems bzhin byed pa po la ni las so //
analyzed: nam min pa la sems bzhin byed pa po la ni las so //
translated: To the agent, as to the mind, belongs the action.

original: g-yo ba dang zas kyi don las so //
analyzed: g-yo ba dang zas kyi don las so //
translated: From the meaning of motion and of food.

original: bu bha yu dha na sha dza na aing pru dru sru rnams las so //
analyzed: bu bha yu dha na sha dza na aing pru dru sru rnams las so //
translated: From the roots bubh, to desire; yudh, to fight; śan, to be auspicious; jan, to be born; prā, to obtain; dru, to run; and śru, to hear.

original: p'a da ma:a'a lam a'a yas pa ri mu ha aatti ru tsir ni ti dhe ta pa da ba sa las ma yin no //
analyzed: p'a da ma:a'a lam a'a yas pa ri mu ha aatti ru tsir ni ti dhe ta pa da ba sa las ma yin no //
translated: From the roots pad, to go; ālam, to desire; āyasa, to be iron; pari, to go around; muha, to be a mouth; at, to be; ruci, to be pleasing; niti, to be a rule; dhe, to be; ta, to be; pada, to be a foot; and vas, to dwell.

original: kyasha las yang na'o //
analyzed: kyasha las yang na'o //
translated: From the root kṣa, to be again.

original: dyu ti sri si shvi ti shubha ru tsighu ti ru ti lu thi ru ti dhvam si /
analyzed: dyu ti sri si shvi ti shubha ru tsighu ti ru ti lu thi ru ti dhvam si /
translated: From the roots dyuti, splendor; śrī, prosperity; śubha, auspicious; ruci, pleasing; ghu, to be; ru, to be; lu, to be; and dhama, to be.

original: gri bhi bri tu bri dhu gri dhu kri b'u syandi rnams las lung la'o //🔽brita rnams las sya san dag la'o //
analyzed: gri bhi bri tu bri dhu gri dhu kri b'u syandi rnams las lung la'o // brita rnams las sya san dag la'o //
translated: From the roots grib, to be broken; bṛtu, to be broken; bṛdh, to be increased; gridh, to be greedy; and kri, to do.🔽From the roots bṛt, to be born; and syan, to be.

original: kleb las lut la'ang ngo //
analyzed: kleb las lut la'ang ngo //
translated: From the root lut, to be.

original: dngos dang las dag la'o //🔽aata las ngita la a'ata kyi yita'o //
analyzed: dngos dang las dag la'o // aata las ngita la a'ata kyi yita'o //
translated: To the thing and to the action.🔽From the root at, to be, the affix ṅit is added.

original: yu ga las aanta'i aata'o //
analyzed: yu ga las aanta'i aata'o //
translated: From the root yug, to be united, the affix ṅat is added.

original: tad las aanta'i aata'o //🔽sh'ing las rata'o //
analyzed: tad las aanta'i aata'o // sh'ing las rata'o //
translated: From the root tad, to be, the affix ṅat is added.🔽From the root śin, to be, the affix ṅat is added.

original: betti las yang na'o //
analyzed: betti las yang na'o //
translated: From the root vet, to be, the affix ṅat is added.

original: lita'i aira'o // ta'i ae sharo //
analyzed: lita'i aira'o // ta'i ae sharo //
translated: From the root lī, to be, the affix ṅir is added. From the root ta, to be, the affix ṅeṣ is added.

analyzed: aarha las bstod pa la'o //

original: ma n+ya ti las so //
analyzed: ma n+ya ti las so //

original: bdag nyid la kha sha'ang ngo //
analyzed: bdag nyid la kha sha'ang ngo //

original: // / byed pa las ya dza la 'das pa la'o //
analyzed: // / byed pa las ya dza la 'das pa la'o //
translated: 1. The affix ya is added to the root yaj, “to sacrifice,” in the past tense.

original: ha ni las smad pa la'o //
analyzed: ha ni las smad pa la'o //
translated: 2. The affix ha is added to the root ha, “to despise.”

original: bi kr'i las ai ni'o //
analyzed: bi kr'i las ai ni'o //
translated: 3. The affix vikri is added to the root i.

original: brahma sogs dang ha na sogs las kvi pa'o //
analyzed: brahma sogs dang ha na sogs las kvi pa'o //
translated: 4. The affix kvip is added to brahma, etc., and to hana, etc.

original: dri sha las kva ni pa'o //
analyzed: dri sha las kva ni pa'o //
translated: 5. The affix kva is added to dṛś.

original: r'a dza dang sa ha las krinya las so //🔽lu dhi las kyang ngo //
analyzed: r'a dza dang sa ha las krinya las so // lu dhi las kyang ngo //

original: ji ni las kyang da 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ji ni las kyang da 'ang ngo //
translated: 8. The affix kṛt is also added to jini.

original: su ya dza las dva ni pa'o//
analyzed: su ya dza las dva ni pa'o//
translated: 9. The affix dvipa is added to suyaja.

original: dz'i rya ti las aa tri na'o //
analyzed: dz'i rya ti las aa tri na'o //
translated: 10. The affix atrini is added to jiryati.

original: nishth'a'o // dngos po dang las dag la kta'o //
analyzed: nishth'a'o // dngos po dang las dag la kta'o //

original: rtsom pa'i byed pa po la'ang ngo //
analyzed: rtsom pa'i byed pa po la'ang ngo //
translated: 12. The affix kta is also added to the agent of the action of beginning.

original: shlisha: sh'ing: sth'a: a'as ba sa: dza na: ruha: dz'ir++ya ti rnams las so //
analyzed: shlisha: sh'ing: sth'a: a'as ba sa: dza na: ruha: dz'ir++ya ti rnams las so //

original: 'gro ba'i don dang las med pa las gzhi la'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don dang las med pa las gzhi la'o //

original: bza' ba'i don la'o //
analyzed: bza' ba'i don la'o //

original: 'dod pa'i blo mchod pa'i don dang nyi 'gro ba las kyang da ltar ba la'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i blo mchod pa'i don dang nyi 'gro ba las kyang da ltar ba la'o //

original: ngang tshul dang legs pa dang chos rnams la trin la'o //
analyzed: ngang tshul dang legs pa dang chos rnams la trin la'o //

analyzed: ni r'a aa lam dag la ka ro ti las aishnu tsa'o //

translated: ju, cakra, dāma, sṛg, dhi, jṛmbhā, śucchalā, and patapada are added to the roots that mean anger and ornament.🔽The affixes

original: ya dang sud d'i ba d'i ksha las ma yin no //
analyzed: ya dang sud d'i ba d'i ksha las ma yin no //
translated: ya, su, dvi, and kṣa are not added.🔽The affixes

original: la sha ba ta pa da: sth'a bh'u: bri ha na: ka ma ga ma shr'i rnams las au kanya'o //
analyzed: la sha ba ta pa da: sth'a bh'u: bri ha na: ka ma ga ma shr'i rnams las au kanya'o //
translated: laśa, bata, pada, sthā, bhu, bhrā, and kāma are added to the roots.🔽The affixes

original: dzalpa bhiksha: kutta: lunta: brid las sh'a kana'o //
analyzed: dzalpa bhiksha: kutta: lunta: brid las sh'a kana'o //
translated: jalpa, bhi, kutta, lunta, and bṛd are added to the roots.🔽The affixes

original: pa ri bh'u: bra s'u dzu: bi shri las ai ni'o //
analyzed: pa ri bh'u: bra s'u dzu: bi shri las ai ni'o //
translated: parī, bhu, prasū, and viśri are added to the roots.

original: ba ma aa bya tha: aa bhyam: drid: dzi: kshi: a'ina  las so //
analyzed: ba ma aa bya tha: aa bhyam: drid: dzi: kshi: a'ina  las so //
translated: The letter A is from the letter Ba.

original: spri hi: gra hi: pa ti: sh'ing las a'a lu tsa'o //
analyzed: spri hi: gra hi: pa ti: sh'ing las a'a lu tsa'o //
translated: The letter U is from the letters Sri, GhrI, and PatI.

original: d'a: dhi: si she da: sa da las ru'o //
analyzed: d'a: dhi: si she da: sa da las ru'o //
translated: The letter Ru is from the letters Dha, Dhi, Shesha, and Sada.

original: svi: ghas aad las kma ra tsa'o //
analyzed: svi: ghas aad las kma ra tsa'o //
translated: The letter Kam is from the letters Svi and Ghasha.

original: bhanydza bh'a sa: mi da las stu ra tsa'o //
analyzed: bhanydza bh'a sa: mi da las stu ra tsa'o //
translated: The letter St is from the letters Bhanja, Bhasa, and Mida.

original: betti las gu ra tsa'o //
analyzed: betti las gu ra tsa'o //
translated: The letter Gu is from the letter Betti.

original: bhi dhi tstshi di lmas las byed pa po la'ang ngo //
analyzed: bhi dhi tstshi di lmas las byed pa po la'ang ngo //
translated: The letter Ka is from the letters Bhidhi and Chhid.🔽The letter Ta is from the letters Ji, I, Na, and Sha.

analyzed: dzi: ain: na: sha sra rnams las ka ra ta'o // ga tva ram'o //

original: dz'a gram las a'u ka'o //
analyzed: dz'a gram las a'u ka'o //
translated: The letter U is from the letter Jagra.

original: ya dza dza pa ba da nga sha las yang las so //
analyzed: ya dza dza pa ba da nga sha las yang las so //
translated: The letter La is from the letters Yaja, Jaja, Pava, and Danda.

original: sa ta ba ha tsal las ki'o //
analyzed: sa ta ba ha tsal las ki'o //

original: p'a pa ti'o //
analyzed: p'a pa ti'o //

analyzed: da bti: tsa kri: sa sri: dzaghni: dza dznyi rnams so //

analyzed: ski: aa dzas hi sa / dvi pa: na ma: ka ma tsha las ra'o //

original: ka san dang a'a: sham sa: bhiksha las au'o //
analyzed: ka san dang a'a: sham sa: bhiksha las au'o //

analyzed: bindu dad aitstshu'o //

analyzed: sva bi tri shi @157a * //

analyzed: dhi sha las na dzi ba'o //

original: shr'i binda las a'a ru'o //
analyzed: shr'i binda las a'a ru'o //

original: bh'i las 'u ka: krug dag go //

analyzed: sth'a: a'i sha: bh'a sa: pi: sa: ka sa las ba ra tsi'o //

original: y'a las yang las so //
analyzed: y'a las yang las so //

original: bhu dza bh'a sa br'i gr'a bastu badyuta aurdzi dhurba las kr'i pa'o //
analyzed: bhu dza bh'a sa br'i gr'a bastu badyuta aurdzi dhurba las kr'i pa'o //

analyzed: dzu: ba tsa: pratstsha a'a ya tastu: ka ta pru: shri las ring po dang aas tyan yang ngo //

analyzed: gzhan rnams las kyang mthong ngo //

analyzed: bi bra: sam las ming ngan pa min pa la'o //

analyzed: phan tshun byed pa la ne tsa'o //
translated: From paraspara, neca.

original: ming la kti'ang ngo //
analyzed: ming la kti'ang ngo //

original: sam dza ma na bid su sh'i bhrinya aan ni sha da ni pa ta las kyang ngo ;
analyzed: sam dza ma na bid su sh'i bhrinya aan ni sha da ni pa ta las kyang ngo ;
translated: From samjanama, vidushita, bhrunyani, shashanipata.

original: ; bra dza ya dza las so //
analyzed: ; bra dza ya dza las so //
translated: From prajaya, jala.

original: krinya las sha 'ang ngo //🔽aitstsh'a mi ba /
analyzed: krinya las sha 'ang ngo // aitstsh'a mi ba /
translated: From kriya, shashana.🔽From icchami.

original: ya a'a t'a tya rnams so //🔽pa ri las sri tsa las ya'o //
analyzed: ya a'a t'a tya rnams so // pa ri las sri tsa las ya'o //
translated: Ya, ata, atya.🔽From parila, sri.

original: dz'a gri las aut kyang ngo //
analyzed: dz'a gri las aut kyang ngo //
translated: From jagri, uta.

original: lci ba ldan pa hal gyi rkyen las so //
analyzed: lci ba ldan pa hal gyi rkyen las so //
translated: From hal, with heavy.

original: bhing sogs dang shita las aada'o //
analyzed: bhing sogs dang shita las aada'o //

original: shrad dang aantar nyer bsgyur rnams las a'ata las so //
analyzed: shrad dang aantar nyer bsgyur rnams las a'ata las so //
translated: From the prefixes śra and antara, and from the prefix a.

original: tsanti p'u dzi: ka thi: sumbi tsa rtsi rnams las so //
analyzed: tsanti p'u dzi: ka thi: sumbi tsa rtsi rnams las so //
translated: From canti, pūjā, kathi, sumvicca, and rucī.

original: ni shanthi granthi: bi d'a a'a sa ghanta: banbha las yu tsa'o //
analyzed: ni shanthi granthi: bi d'a a'a sa ghanta: banbha las yu tsa'o //
translated: From niśānthi, granthi, vidā, āsagha, ghanta, and vanbha, yuca.

original: ai sha las: rjes su 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: ai sha las: rjes su 'dod pa la'o //
translated: From iśa, after the desire.

original: nu tsa'o // 'dri ba dang bshad pa dag la ainya 'ang ngo //
analyzed: nu tsa'o // 'dri ba dang bshad pa dag la ainya 'ang ngo //

original: sambada sogs las kvi pa'o //
analyzed: sambada sogs las kvi pa'o //
translated: From sambandha, etc., kavi.

original: nanya las khros tshig la aa ni'o //
analyzed: nanya las khros tshig la aa ni'o //

original: aa ni: gl'a ml'a h'a: dzy'a las so //
analyzed: aa ni: gl'a ml'a h'a: dzy'a las so //
translated: From ani, glāmalaha, jaya.🔽From aji, kṛṣya, etc., iṇa, ika.

original: aa dzi: kri shya sogs las ainya: ai ka dag go / zhes pa s'a dhu k'irti'i 'jam dpal gyi brda sprod pa las skabs gnyis pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: aa dzi: kri shya sogs las ainya: ai ka dag go / zhes pa s'a dhu k'irti'i 'jam dpal gyi brda sprod pa las skabs gnyis pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the second chapter of Mañjuśrī's Grammar of Sadhukīrti.

original: // / rang gi ngo bo la ai ki / shti  baka  aa rnams so //
analyzed: // / rang gi ngo bo la ai ki / shti  baka  aa rnams so //
translated: In its own nature, iṅ. From śat, bak, and a.

original: dngos po la ma ning la kta'o //
analyzed: dngos po la ma ning la kta'o //
translated: In things, in the neuter, kta.

original: yut 'ang ngo //
analyzed: yut 'ang ngo //

original: shthi bu si bu dag gi ring po'ang yang na'o //
analyzed: shthi bu si bu dag gi ring po'ang yang na'o //

original: krinya la byed pa po la'o //
analyzed: krinya la byed pa po la'o //

original: gha'o // bi la aa dza las so //
analyzed: gha'o // bi la aa dza las so //
translated: Aj.🔽Da.🔽Ka.🔽Na.

original: kha na las da ra aika dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: kha na las da ra aika dag kyang ngo //
translated: Da.🔽Rika.🔽A.

original: a'i shata du:su rnams las kha la'o //
analyzed: a'i shata du:su rnams las kha la'o //
translated: Ishta.🔽Du.🔽Su.🔽Rnams.🔽Ka.🔽La.🔽Bhuk.

original: byed pa po dang las dag la bh'u krinya las so //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las dag la bh'u krinya las so //
translated: Tni.🔽Las.🔽Sha.🔽Si.🔽Yudhi.

original: sh'a si: yu dhi: dri shi: dhri shi: mrisha: a'ata las yu tsa'o //
analyzed: sh'a si: yu dhi: dri shi: dhri shi: mrisha: a'ata las yu tsa'o //
translated: Drishi.🔽Dhrishti.🔽Mrisha.🔽At.🔽Yuc.🔽Ala.🔽M.

original: aa lam kha lu las dgag pa la kta yang na'o //
analyzed: aa lam kha lu las dgag pa la kta yang na'o //
translated: Khalo.🔽Las.🔽Dhaga.🔽Pa.🔽Nam.

original: ma de las tum 'i don las so //🔽bya ba gcig gi rim pa snga ma las so //
analyzed: ma de las tum 'i don las so // bya ba gcig gi rim pa snga ma las so //
translated: Tu.🔽M.🔽Dena.🔽Las.

original: yang yang la na ma @158b yang na'o //🔽b'urba aa gre: pra tha ma las bsdu ba med pa'ang ngo //
analyzed: yang yang la na ma @158b yang na'o // b'urba aa gre: pra tha ma las bsdu ba med pa'ang ngo //
translated: Tum.🔽I.🔽Dhana.🔽Ya.🔽Nga.🔽Bhurva.

original: spyo ba las las krinya las kha munya'o //🔽zhim pa'i don las ring po ma yin pa las so //
analyzed: spyo ba las las krinya las kha munya'o // zhim pa'i don las ring po ma yin pa las so //
