original: aa n+ya: th'a ae bam: ka tham aidtham las bya ba'i khyad par nyid la'o //🔽ya th'a ta th'a dag mi nus pa'i lan la'o //
analyzed: aa n+ya: th'a ae bam: ka tham aidtham las bya ba'i khyad par nyid la'o // ya th'a ta th'a dag mi nus pa'i lan la'o //
translated: Prathama.🔽Las.

original: dri shi: bi da las mtha' dag la'o //
analyzed: dri shi: bi da las mtha' dag la'o //
translated: Bindu.🔽M.🔽A.

original: y'a bata las bandi ti dang dz'i ba las so //🔽au pa ki ra:'o //
analyzed: y'a bata las bandi ti dang dz'i ba las so // au pa ki ra:'o //
translated: from Yavati, from Bandin, and from Jivapala.🔽from Upakirti.

original: tsarma au da ra  las p'u ra la'o //
analyzed: tsarma au da ra  las p'u ra la'o //
translated: from Carmaudara, from Pura.

original: char pa'i tshad la ste a'u dbyi ba'ang yang na'o //
analyzed: char pa'i tshad la ste a'u dbyi ba'ang yang na'o //
translated: in the measure of rain, also in the measure of udvi.

original: tsa la las kno pi las so //
analyzed: tsa la las kno pi las so //
translated: from Cula, from Kanopila.

original: ni m'u la sa mu la kasha las de yang rjes su'o //
analyzed: ni m'u la sa mu la kasha las de yang rjes su'o //
translated: from Nimula, from Samulakṣa, and also from Anus.

original: shushka: ts'urnna: r'u ksha: las bisha las so //
analyzed: shushka: ts'urnna: r'u ksha: las bisha las so //
translated: from Śuṣka, from Cūrṇa, from Rūkṣa, from Viśala.

original: sa m'u ya aa kri ta: dz'i pa rnams las ha na krinya gra ha las so //
analyzed: sa m'u ya aa kri ta: dz'i pa rnams las ha na krinya gra ha las so //
translated: from Samūyākṛta, from Jīvaras, from Hanakṛt, from Han.

original: ha na las byed pa las so //
analyzed: ha na las byed pa las so //
translated: from Han, from Karman.

original: sne ha na las pi sha las so //🔽lag pa las brti gra  ha las so //🔽rang don la pu sha las so //
analyzed: sne ha na las pi sha las so // lag pa las brti gra  ha las so // rang don la pu sha las so //
translated: from Snehana, from Piśala.🔽from Karman, from Bṛhat.

original: spyir btang las bandha las so //
analyzed: spyir btang las bandha las so //
translated: from Puṣkala, from Bandha.

original: ming la'o // byed pa po las dz'i ba bu ru sha las na shi ba ha las so //
analyzed: ming la'o // byed pa po las dz'i ba bu ru sha las na shi ba ha las so //
translated: in the name, from the agent, from Jivapuruṣa, from Naśivāha.

original: a'urdh'a las shu sha: b'u ri las so //
analyzed: a'urdh'a las shu sha: b'u ri las so //
translated: from Ūrdhva, from Śuṣa, from Vūri.

original: nye bar 'jal ba las las kyang ngo //
analyzed: nye bar 'jal ba las las kyang ngo //
translated: from Upamāna, from Karma also.

original: au pa dam sha las gsum pa las so //
analyzed: au pa dam sha las gsum pa las so //
translated: from Upaḍamśa, from the third.

original: 'tshe ba'i don las las gcig pa las so //
analyzed: 'tshe ba'i don las las gcig pa las so //
translated: From the meaning of injury, from the action.

original: au pa las p'a di ru dha karsha las bdun pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: au pa las p'a di ru dha karsha las bdun pa las kyang ngo //
translated: From the seventh case, from the root upa-pad, and from the root karsh.

original: tshad dang a'a satti dag las so //
analyzed: tshad dang a'a satti dag las so //
translated: From the word measure and from the word asat.

original: lnga pa las myur ba la'o //
analyzed: lnga pa las myur ba la'o //
translated: From the fifth case, in the word quick.

original: gnyis pa las so //
analyzed: gnyis pa las so //
translated: From the second case.

original: rang gi yan lag las ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi yan lag las ma nges pa'o //
translated: From one's own member, the indeclinable.

original: bcer ba la'o //
analyzed: bcer ba la'o //
translated: In the word naked.

original: pi shi pa ti: pa di skanda rnams la khyab par 'dod pa dang yang yang dag la'o //
analyzed: pi shi pa ti: pa di skanda rnams la khyab par 'dod pa dang yang yang dag la'o //
translated: In the words pishipadi, skand, and in the word again and again.

original: dus las aa su: tri sha las bar chod pa la'o //
analyzed: dus las aa su: tri sha las bar chod pa la'o //
translated: From the word time, from the word asu, and from the word obstacle.

original: ming las gra ha las di sha las so //
analyzed: ming las gra ha las di sha las so //
translated: From the word name, from the word graha, and from the word direction.

original: mi zad pa las mi 'dod pa brjod pa la krinya las kta yang ngo //
analyzed: mi zad pa las mi 'dod pa brjod pa la krinya las kta yang ngo //
translated: From the word inexhaustible, in the word akrita, and in the word kat.

original: tirlam tsa las aa pa brga la'o //
analyzed: tirlam tsa las aa pa brga la'o //
translated: In the word apabharga, from the word tirlamcha.

original: rang gi yan lag las ha sa las bhu las kyang ngo //
analyzed: rang gi yan lag las ha sa las bhu las kyang ngo //
translated: From one's own member, from the word hasta, and from the word bhu.

original: n'a dh'a'i don dang rkyen las tsvi min pa las so //
analyzed: n'a dh'a'i don dang rkyen las tsvi min pa las so //
translated: From the word naadhi, from the word cva, and from the word meaning and condition.

original: t'ushn'i ma las bh'u las so //
analyzed: t'ushn'i ma las bh'u las so //
translated: From the word bhu, from the word tushnami.

original: ae nva ka las rjes su mthun pa la'o //
analyzed: ae nva ka las rjes su mthun pa la'o //
translated: In the word anukula, from the word enavaka.

original: aun la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: aun la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The words un and so on.

original: zhes pa s'a dhu k'irtti'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs gsum pa'i rkang pa dang po rdzogs so /
analyzed: zhes pa s'a dhu k'irtti'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs gsum pa'i rkang pa dang po rdzogs so /
translated: Thus ends the first quarter-verse of the third chapter in the Sādhu Kirti’s Mañjuśrī’s Grammar.

original: // / @159a * //  bya ba rgyu'i dngos pos brjod par 'dod pa ni byed pa can no //
analyzed: // / @159a * //  bya ba rgyu'i dngos pos brjod par 'dod pa ni byed pa can no //
translated: The one who is the agent is the one who is the cause of the action.

original: de la rang dbang ni byed pa po'o //
analyzed: de la rang dbang ni byed pa po'o //
translated: There, the independent one is the agent.

original: der sbyor ba po yang ngo //
analyzed: der sbyor ba po yang ngo //
translated: The one who is engaged in that is also the agent.

original: bya ba ni las so //
analyzed: bya ba ni las so //
translated: The action is the object.

original: 'dze  ba la sogs pa dang de'i rgyu mtshan yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dze  ba la sogs pa dang de'i rgyu mtshan yang ngo //
translated: The reason for that, such as climbing, is also the object.

original: aa dh'i sh'i da stha a'asa rnams kyi gzhi'o //
analyzed: aa dh'i sh'i da stha a'asa rnams kyi gzhi'o //
translated: The basis of the adhi, ās, and ās is the object.

original: aa dhi aa nu: au pa: a'ad rnams las ba sha las nye bar gnas pa min pa la'o //
analyzed: aa dhi aa nu: au pa: a'ad rnams las ba sha las nye bar gnas pa min pa la'o //
translated: From adhi, anu, and ād, the suffix -a is added to the non-locative.

original: aa bhi ni ra bi sha las kyang ngo //
analyzed: aa bhi ni ra bi sha las kyang ngo //
translated: From abhi and viśa, also.

original: ga ti: blo dang zas kyi don gyi sgra las dang las min pa rnams kyi sbyar bya'o //
analyzed: ga ti: blo dang zas kyi don gyi sgra las dang las min pa rnams kyi sbyar bya'o //
translated: From the words meaning mind and food, the suffix -a is added to the non-locative.

original: ba hi las kha lo ba la'o //🔽bhya kshi las 'tshe ba la'o //🔽tri kri las yang na'o //
analyzed: ba hi las kha lo ba la'o // bhya kshi las 'tshe ba la'o // tri kri las yang na'o //
translated: From bhu, the suffix -i is added to the locative.🔽From bhya and kṣi, the suffix -i is added to the locative.

original: dri shi aa: bhi b'a di dag las tad a'a na la'o //
analyzed: dri shi aa: bhi b'a di dag las tad a'a na la'o //
translated: From tri and kṛ, the suffix -i is added to the locative.🔽From dṛś, ās, and bhav, the suffix -i is added to the locative.

original: kh'a di: aa di: hv'a shabh'a ya n'i: kranda rnams kyi ma yin no //
analyzed: kh'a di: aa di: hv'a shabh'a ya n'i: kranda rnams kyi ma yin no //
translated: KĀDI: ĀDI: HVAŚA-YĀNI: KRĀNTA-s:

original: bya ba'i khyad par 'ang ngo //
analyzed: bya ba'i khyad par 'ang ngo //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote a particular action.

original: sgrub byed mchog byed pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub byed mchog byed pa'o //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote the best of actions.

original: di na las las la yang 'o //
analyzed: di na las las la yang 'o //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote an action.

original: gang gi ched du yin pa de dang de yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi ched du yin pa de dang de yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa'o //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote the proper giving of that for which it is intended.

original: sred pa'i don dang dga' bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa'i don dang dga' bar byed pa'o //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote the meaning of craving and delight.

original: bu lon phyi ma 'dzin pa'ang ngo //
analyzed: bu lon phyi ma 'dzin pa'ang ngo //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote the holding of future debts.

original: khro ba'i don dang khro ba'i gnas la las med pa'o //
analyzed: khro ba'i don dang khro ba'i gnas la las med pa'o //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote the meaning of anger and the absence of action in the abode of anger.

original: shl'a gha ha  sth'a sha ba rnams kyi shes par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: shl'a gha ha  sth'a sha ba rnams kyi shes par 'dod pa'o //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote the desire to know the Śalāghatasthāśavas.

original: r'a dhi a'iksha las rnam par dri ba gang yin pa nges par byed pa'o //
analyzed: r'a dhi a'iksha las rnam par dri ba gang yin pa nges par byed pa'o //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote the ascertainment of whatever is inquired about.

original: shu las ched du rang gir byed pa'o //
analyzed: shu las ched du rang gir byed pa'o //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote the deliberate appropriation of one's own.

original: kri na las spro ba dang bstod pa'o //
analyzed: kri na las spro ba dang bstod pa'o //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote enthusiasm and praise.

original: sbri hi las lba la yang na'o //
analyzed: sbri hi las lba la yang na'o //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote the state of being a bubble.

original: smad pa la noo sogs min pa la ma n+ya ti las so //
analyzed: smad pa la noo sogs min pa la ma n+ya ti las so //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote the absence of contempt, etc.

original: 'gro ba'i don la byed pa la aa r'u dha aa dhva min pa la'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don la byed pa la aa r'u dha aa dhva min pa la'o //
translated: [The affix] KĀ is added to verbs to denote activity for the sake of beings.

original: nges par 'gro ba'i mtshams ni nges par kun sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: nges par 'gro ba'i mtshams ni nges par kun sbyin pa'o //
translated: The root of the word niṣṭhā is niṣṭhā, which means “to give up completely.”

original: 'jigs pa dang skyob pa'i don rnams 'jigs pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa dang skyob pa'i don rnams 'jigs pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: The root of the word bhaya is bhaya, which means “cause of fear.”

original: ba r'a dang dzi las mi bzod pa'o //
analyzed: ba r'a dang dzi las mi bzod pa'o //
translated: The root of the word akṣamā is akṣamā, which means “not patient.”

original: gang las bsrung ba'i don gyi las la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gang las bsrung ba'i don gyi las la 'jug pa'o //
translated: The root of the word rakṣaṇa is rakṣaṇa, which means “to engage in the activity of protecting.”

original: aandardhi la gang gis mi mthong bar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: aandardhi la gang gis mi mthong bar 'dod pa'o //
translated: The root of the word adṛṣṭa is adṛṣṭa, which means “not seen.”

original: aabhi dang aing gi don byed pa po ste bla ma'o //
analyzed: aabhi dang aing gi don byed pa po ste bla ma'o //
translated: The root of the word abhi is abhi, which means “to do” and “to be a teacher.”

original: dza ni las rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dza ni las rang bzhin no //
translated: The root of the word jana is jana, which means “nature of action.”

original: bh'u las rab tu byung ba'o /
analyzed: bh'u las rab tu byung ba'o /
translated: The root of the word pravrajita is pravrajita, which means “to go forth.”

original: de 'di'i sgra la dh'i las rgyu dang 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: de 'di'i sgra la dh'i las rgyu dang 'brel ba'o //
translated: The root of the word hetu is hetu, which means “to be connected with a cause.”

original: gzhi'i dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: gzhi'i dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: This is the section on the basis.

original: zhes pa s'a dhu k'irtti'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs gsum pa'i rkang pa gnyis pa @159b rdzogs so /
analyzed: zhes pa s'a dhu k'irtti'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs gsum pa'i rkang pa gnyis pa @159b rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the second line of the third section of the Mañjuśrī Verbal Key to the Treasury of Abhidharma composed by Sadhukīrti.

original: // / aangga las: su: aoo dzas'o //
analyzed: // / aangga las: su: aoo dzas'o //
translated: The root of the word aṅga is aṅga, which means “limb.”🔽The root of the word saṃkhyā is saṃkhyā, which means “countable.”🔽The root of the word saṃkhyā is saṃkhyā, which means “countable.”

original: grangs dang grangs med pa dag las so //🔽bod pa la'o //
analyzed: grangs dang grangs med pa dag las so // bod pa la'o //
translated: The root of the word asaṃkhyeya is asaṃkhyeya, which means “not countable.”

original: ma brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: ma brjod pa la'o //
translated: The root of the word akhyeya is akhyeya, which means “not to be spoken.”

original: las la aam aoo ta: shasa'o //
analyzed: las la aam aoo ta: shasa'o //
translated: The root of the word karma is karma, which means “action.”

original: sa ma y'a: ni ka sh'a aantar aanta re na /
analyzed: sa ma y'a: ni ka sh'a aantar aanta re na /
translated: Samaya means in the middle of Kashana.

original: ldan pa las so //
analyzed: ldan pa las so //
translated: It is from the compound.

original: h'a dang dh'i ga dag las bod pa min pa la'o //
analyzed: h'a dang dh'i ga dag las bod pa min pa la'o //
translated: Ha and Dha are for the non-Tibetan.

original: y'a bata la ste t'a bata la ma yin no //
analyzed: y'a bata la ste t'a bata la ma yin no //
translated: Ya is for the Tibetan, not for the non-Tibetan.

original: gnyis nyid la aa bhi sogs rnams dang sarba rnams dang pa ri au bha ya las tas tang ngo: ae na ba dang yang na'o //
analyzed: gnyis nyid la aa bhi sogs rnams dang sarba rnams dang pa ri au bha ya las tas tang ngo: ae na ba dang yang na'o //
translated: In the case of duality, Abhis and so on, Sarvas, and Pari Ubhaya, it is from Tas.

original: mtshan nyid khyab 'dod dang / 'di ltar gyur pa rnams la aa bhi dang ngo //
analyzed: mtshan nyid khyab 'dod dang / 'di ltar gyur pa rnams la aa bhi dang ngo //
translated: In the case of characteristics, pervasion, and desire, and in the case of such things, it is from Abhis.

original: bra ti pa ri dag la chal yang ngo //
analyzed: bra ti pa ri dag la chal yang ngo //
translated: In the case of Pratha and Pari, it is also from Chal.

original: aa nu dang yang ngo //
analyzed: aa nu dang yang ngo //
translated: It is also from Anu.

original: he tu dang lhan cig pa'i don dag la'o //
analyzed: he tu dang lhan cig pa'i don dag la'o //
translated: It is in the case of Hetu and co-meaning.

original: autkramshta las dman pa la'o //
analyzed: autkramshta las dman pa la'o //
translated: From Utkramshat, it is for the inferior.

original: au pa dang ngo //
analyzed: au pa dang ngo //
translated: It is from Upa.

original: dus dang lam dag la khyab pa la'o //
analyzed: dus dang lam dag la khyab pa la'o //
translated: In the case of time and path, it is for pervasion.

original: byed pa po la d'a bhy'a ma bhisa'o //
analyzed: byed pa po la d'a bhy'a ma bhisa'o //
translated: In the case of the agent, it is from Adbhaya.

original: byed pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: byed pa la yang ngo //
translated: It is also in the case of action.

original: ba ri kri las bzhi pa la'ang ngo//
analyzed: ba ri kri las bzhi pa la'ang ngo//
translated: From Parikri, it is also for the fourth.

original: lhan cig gi don la'ang ngo //
analyzed: lhan cig gi don la'ang ngo //
translated: It is also in the case of co-meaning.

original: mtshan nyid la'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid la'o //
translated: It is in the case of characteristics.

original: sam dza na las las la yang na'o //
analyzed: sam dza na las las la yang na'o //
translated: From Samjna, it is also in the case of karma.

original: rgyu la'o // bu 'o na la lnga pa ste byed pa po la ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu la'o // bu 'o na la lnga pa ste byed pa po la ma yin no //
translated: In the fifth case, not in the agent.

original: yon tan la yang na'o //
analyzed: yon tan la yang na'o //
translated: In the quality.

original: he tu sbyor ba la drug pa'o //
analyzed: he tu sbyor ba la drug pa'o //
translated: In the application of the hetu.

original: sarba rnams te sarba n'a ma rnams he tu'i don dang ngo //
analyzed: sarba rnams te sarba n'a ma rnams he tu'i don dang ngo //
translated: All the sarvas are in the sense of hetu.

original: yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa la de bhyam bhyasa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa la de bhyam bhyasa'o //
translated: In the perfect bestowal, there is bhyam bhyas.

original: na ma:sva sti sv'a h'a: sva dh'a ba sha ta: nus pa'i don dang ngo //
analyzed: na ma:sva sti sv'a h'a: sva dh'a ba sha ta: nus pa'i don dang ngo //
translated: Namas svāstivāśataṃ nus in the sense of ability.

original: de'i don la'o //
analyzed: de'i don la'o //
translated: In its meaning.

original: byings rnams kyi 'grod  ba de las la'o //
analyzed: byings rnams kyi 'grod  ba de las la'o //
translated: In the movement of the roots.

original: des par kun sbyin pa la dis: bhyam: bhyasa'o //
analyzed: des par kun sbyin pa la dis: bhyam: bhyasa'o //
translated: In the bestowal of that, there is dis bhyam bhyas.

original: lyap ma bstan pa dang las 'dzin pa dag la'o //
analyzed: lyap ma bstan pa dang las 'dzin pa dag la'o //
translated: In the teaching of the lyap and in the holding of the action.

original: aa n+ya'i don dang aita ra a'a r'a ta: dika: shabda aan+y'a auntar au tsa dang hi sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: aa n+ya'i don dang aita ra a'a r'a ta: dika: shabda aan+y'a auntar au tsa dang hi sbyor ba la'o //
translated: In the sense of anya, itara, ārat, dik, śabda, anya, antara, ucca, and hi, in the application.

original: gang las dus dang aa dhva dang m'ana'o //
analyzed: gang las dus dang aa dhva dang m'ana'o //
translated: From which, time, adhvā, and mā.

original: aa dha ma: autta ma: b'a la sogs kyi don dang ngo //
analyzed: aa dha ma: autta ma: b'a la sogs kyi don dang ngo //
translated: In the meaning of adha, uttama, and vā, etc.

original: ba ri: ai pa dag las brdzan la'o //
analyzed: ba ri: ai pa dag las brdzan la'o //
translated: In the question, from bari and iva.

original: khyab pa dang lugs la sogs las a'ang ngo //
analyzed: khyab pa dang lugs la sogs las a'ang ngo //
translated: from khyâpa, and from lus, etc.

original: bri thag n'a n'a gsum pa yang na'o //
analyzed: bri thag n'a n'a gsum pa yang na'o //
translated: from tri, and from trika, the three.

original: sto ka aa wa kritstsha: ka ti pa ya las sems can ma yin pa las byed pa la'o //
analyzed: sto ka aa wa kritstsha: ka ti pa ya las sems can ma yin pa las byed pa la'o //
translated: from ava, krit, and from kâti, in the case of an action not pertaining to a living being.

original: pra ti las pra ri ni dhi: pra ti d'a na dag las so //
analyzed: pra ti las pra ri ni dhi: pra ti d'a na dag las so //
translated: from prati, the two, pri and ni, in the case of prati-dâna, a gift.

original: rita la gnyis pa yang na'o //
analyzed: rita la gnyis pa yang na'o //
translated: from ri, the two, ta and na.

original: bi na dang gsum pa dang yang ngo //🔽'brel pa la das aas a'a ma'o//
analyzed: bi na dang gsum pa dang yang ngo // 'brel pa la das aas a'a ma'o//
translated: from vi, the three, na and na.

original: @160a * // stada'i dang ngo //
analyzed: @160a * // stada'i dang ngo //
translated: from sa, the two, sa and a.🔽from ta, the two, ta and di.

original: kri tva'i don dang gzhi dang dus la yang na'o //
analyzed: kri tva'i don dang gzhi dang dus la yang na'o //
translated: from krit, in the case of the meaning, the basis, and the time.

original: bhr'arthi la dzny'a las byed pa la'o //
analyzed: bhr'arthi la dzny'a las byed pa la'o //
translated: from bhar, in the case of jña, an action.

original: tshim pa'i don gyi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: tshim pa'i don gyi 'ang ngo //
translated: from the meaning of satiation, the two, a and na.

original: dran pa'i don la da ya a'i sha la las la'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i don la da ya a'i sha la las la'o //
translated: from krit, in the case of the meaning of memory, the two, da and ya.

original: krinya las 'bad pa la'o //
analyzed: krinya las 'bad pa la'o //
translated: from krit, in the case of the meaning of effort, the two, ya and na.

original: de grub pa byed pa po la nad kyi don la'o //
analyzed: de grub pa byed pa po la nad kyi don la'o //
translated: from krit, in the case of the meaning of the agent who accomplishes that, the two, na and da.

original: smon pa la n'a tha las so //
analyzed: smon pa la n'a tha las so //
translated: from na, in the case of the meaning of aspiration, the two, na and tha.

original: dza si ni pra ha na: a'a ti: kr'a thi: bi sha rnams kyi 'tshe ba la'o //
analyzed: dza si ni pra ha na: a'a ti: kr'a thi: bi sha rnams kyi 'tshe ba la'o //
translated: from jasi, in the case of the meaning of the harm of the kra, vi, and śa.

original: bya ba hri: ba ni: di ba rnams kyi tshong dang brje ba dag la'o //
analyzed: bya ba hri: ba ni: di ba rnams kyi tshong dang brje ba dag la'o //
translated: The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the actions of the divinities, such as Viṣṇu, in the sense of their being the agent.

original: byed pa po dang las dag la krita las so //🔽ka mi las auka nya'o //🔽gnyis dag gi gtso bo'i las la'o //🔽las la las byas pa la ma yin no //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las dag la krita las so // ka mi las auka nya'o // gnyis dag gi gtso bo'i las la'o // las la las byas pa la ma yin no //
translated: The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the agent and the object.🔽The uka suffix is added to the names of the two, the agent and the object, in the sense of the primary action.🔽The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the two, the agent and the object, in the sense of the secondary action.

original: kta'i gzhi la 'jug pa dag la'o //
analyzed: kta'i gzhi la 'jug pa dag la'o //
translated: The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the two, the agent and the object, in the sense of the action being done.🔽The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the two, the agent and the object, in the sense of the basis.

original: byung ba can ma yin pa'i dngos po'i 'o //🔽kri tya rnams byed pa po la yang na'o //
analyzed: byung ba can ma yin pa'i dngos po'i 'o // kri tya rnams byed pa po la yang na'o //
translated: The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the two, the agent and the object, in the sense of the non-existent thing.🔽The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the two, the agent and the object, in the sense of the agent.

original: gnyis ga thob pa las so //
analyzed: gnyis ga thob pa las so //
translated: The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the two, the agent and the object, in the sense of the attainment of both.

original: bud med la bu ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: bud med la bu ma yin pa la'o //
translated: The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the two, the agent and the object, in the sense of the non-son of a woman.

original: pa  dang mi zad pa dang nishtha dang kha la'i don dang trin dad au las ma yin no //🔽pun dang tu ma'i don la'o //
analyzed: pa  dang mi zad pa dang nishtha dang kha la'i don dang trin dad au las ma yin no // pun dang tu ma'i don la'o //
translated: The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the two, the agent and the object, in the sense of the non-exhaustion, the non-end, and the non-mouth.🔽The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the two, the agent and the object, in the sense of the again and the again.

original: ain las bh'a bya: dha marnna dag las so //🔽dvashi las sha tri'i yang na'o //
analyzed: ain las bh'a bya: dha marnna dag las so // dvashi las sha tri'i yang na'o //
translated: The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the two, the agent and the object, in the sense of the enemy.

original: sv'a mi: a'i shva ra: aa dhi pa ti: d'a y'a da: s'a kshi pra ti bh'u: pra s'u ta rnams dang bdun pa'ang ngo //
analyzed: sv'a mi: a'i shva ra: aa dhi pa ti: d'a y'a da: s'a kshi pra ti bh'u: pra s'u ta rnams dang bdun pa'ang ngo //
translated: The kṛt suffix is added to the names of the two, the agent and the object, in the sense of the seven, the minister, the king, the lord, the giver, the witness, the substitute, and the messenger.

original: gang las nges par gzung ba de'i khyad par gyi'o //
analyzed: gang las nges par gzung ba de'i khyad par gyi'o //
translated: The particular of that from which it is definitely apprehended.🔽

original: mtshungs pa'i don rnams kyis gsum pa'o //
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i don rnams kyis gsum pa'o //
translated: The third is by those which have the same meaning.

original: hi ta dang su kha dag la bzhi pa'o //🔽smon pa la a'a yu shya: bha dra: aartha: ku sha la'i don rnams dang ngo //
analyzed: hi ta dang su kha dag la bzhi pa'o // smon pa la a'a yu shya: bha dra: aartha: ku sha la'i don rnams dang ngo //
translated: The fourth is by those which have the same meaning, such as hitā and sukha.🔽The fifth is by those which have the same meaning, such as āyuṣya, bhadra, artha, and kuśala.

original: gzhi la ngi: aos: su pa'o //
analyzed: gzhi la ngi: aos: su pa'o //
translated: The sixth is by those which have the same base, such as giḥ, os, and supa.

original: rgyu mtshan gyi las las so //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gyi las las so //
translated: The seventh is by those which have the same reason.

original: kya'i ain las las la'o //
analyzed: kya'i ain las las la'o //
translated: The eighth is by those which have the same action.

original: dus 'jal ba las so //
analyzed: dus 'jal ba las so //
translated: The ninth is by those which have the same time.

original: lam las dang po 'ang ngo //🔽au pa yis a'a dhikya la'o //
analyzed: lam las dang po 'ang ngo // au pa yis a'a dhikya la'o //
translated: The tenth is by those which have the same path.🔽The eleventh is by those which have the same superior.

original: sv'a mya las aa dhi dang ngo //
analyzed: sv'a mya las aa dhi dang ngo //
translated: The twelfth is by those which have the same superior.

original: gang bya ba: bya ba'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: gang bya ba: bya ba'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: The thirteenth is by those which have the same sign of action.

original: drug pas ma gus pa la'o //🔽a'a yukta dar ku sha la dag la yang kun tu bsten pa la'o //
analyzed: drug pas ma gus pa la'o // a'a yukta dar ku sha la dag la yang kun tu bsten pa la'o //
translated: The fourteenth is by those which have the same disrespect.🔽The fifteenth is by those which have the same reliance.

original: lnga pa dang bdun pa dag la byed pa po par ma dang dus dang lam dag go //
analyzed: lnga pa dang bdun pa dag la byed pa po par ma dang dus dang lam dag go //
translated: The sixteenth is by those which have the same agent, the seventh case, time, and path.🔽The seventeenth is by those which have the same place.

original: aata las bhi sa'i aeesa'o //
analyzed: aata las bhi sa'i aeesa'o //
translated: The eighteenth is by those which have the same time.

original: ai dam: aa das dag gi ka las so //🔽t'a: ngas dag gi ai @160b na: sya dag go //
analyzed: ai dam: aa das dag gi ka las so //🔽t'a: ngas dag gi ai @160b na: sya dag go //
translated: The nineteenth is by those which have the same action.

original: nga si de dag gi ya a'ad dag go //
analyzed: nga si de dag gi ya a'ad dag go //
translated: The ya of the siddhas.

original: sarba n'a man las smata smee'o //
analyzed: sarba n'a man las smata smee'o //
translated: Sarvanaman-la-smṛto.

original: sarbba la sogs pa rnams sarba n'a ma'o //
analyzed: sarbba la sogs pa rnams sarba n'a ma'o //
translated: Sarva, etc. are Sarvanaman.

original: di li smin 'o //
analyzed: di li smin 'o //
translated: Dili-smṛto.

original: dzas kyi sh'i'o //
analyzed: dzas kyi sh'i'o //
translated: Jasa-kṣīti.

original: gtso bo ma yin pa dang ming las gzhan yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gtso bo ma yin pa dang ming las gzhan yang ma yin no //
translated: Not the principal, nor other than the name.

original: gsum pa sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: gsum pa sbyor ba la'o //
translated: The third is in the compound.

original: dang gi don la'o //
analyzed: dang gi don la'o //
translated: In the sense of and.

original: sh'ing yang na'o //
analyzed: sh'ing yang na'o //
translated: Śaṅkhyā-nā.

original: bra tha ma: tsa ra ma: ta ya aa: ya aalpa: aardha: ne ma: ka ti pa ya las so //
analyzed: bra tha ma: tsa ra ma: ta ya aa: ya aalpa: aardha: ne ma: ka ti pa ya las so //
translated: Prathamaḥ, caramaḥ, tayā, yalpaḥ, ardhaḥ, nemiḥ, katipayaḥ.

original: p'urba sogs rnams las sm'at: smin dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: p'urba sogs rnams las sm'at: smin dag kyang ngo //
translated: Purvādīnāṃ samāto, smṛtaḥ.

original: a'apa las aoota kyi sh'i'o //
analyzed: a'apa las aoota kyi sh'i'o //
translated: Apa-la-so 'ut-kṣīti.

original: ma ning las so //
analyzed: ma ning las so //
translated: From the neutral.

original: dzas shas dag gi shi'o //
analyzed: dzas shas dag gi shi'o //
translated: Jasa-kṣīti.

original: aashta rnams las aoo sha'o //
analyzed: aashta rnams las aoo sha'o //
translated: Aṣṭānām au-kṣīti.

original: da ti dang: grangs las shna las 'jig go //
analyzed: da ti dang: grangs las shna las 'jig go //
translated: Dāti-ca-saṃkhyā-śaṃ-kṣīti.

original: su aa ma dag ma ning las so //
analyzed: su aa ma dag ma ning las so //
translated: Su-a-mā-neutral.

original: aat las aa ma'o //
analyzed: aat las aa ma'o //
translated: Ata-la-a-mā.

original: da ta ra sogs lnga rnams las ae ka ta ra ma yin pa las so //
analyzed: da ta ra sogs lnga rnams las ae ka ta ra ma yin pa las so //
translated: Dat-tāra-ādi-pañcānām eka-tāra-mā.

original: yushmad: aa smad dag gi ngas kyi aa sha'o //
analyzed: yushmad: aa smad dag gi ngas kyi aa sha'o //
translated: Yuṣmād-a-smād-aṅgasya a-kṣīti.

original: de su ta dag gi aa ma'o //🔽shas kyi aana'o //🔽bhyas kyi aa bhyama'ang ngo //
analyzed: de su ta dag gi aa ma'o // shas kyi aana'o // bhyas kyi aa bhyama'ang ngo //
translated: The mother of the Sutas is Suta-dā.🔽The An of the Svas is Svas-an.

original: nga si'i 'ang a'ata'o //
analyzed: nga si'i 'ang a'ata'o //
translated: The Abhyam of the Bhyas is Bhyas-abhyam.🔽The At of the As is As-at.

original: a'a ma'i a'a ka ma'o //
analyzed: a'a ma'i a'a ka ma'o //
translated: The Akam of the Ams is Am-ākam.

original: thung ngu: na d'i: aa pa las nuta'o //
analyzed: thung ngu: na d'i: aa pa las nuta'o //
translated: The Nuta of the Apas is Apā-nuda.

original: sarbba n'a ma aata las su ta'o //
analyzed: sarbba n'a ma aata las su ta'o //
translated: The Sut of the Sarva-nāmas is Sarva-nāma-suta.

original: grangs las aata min pa las so //
analyzed: grangs las aata min pa las so //
translated: The Am of the Atmins is Atma-am.

original: tra y'a n'am: mi zad pa las supa 'jig go //
analyzed: tra y'a n'am: mi zad pa las supa 'jig go //
translated: The Supa of the Trayānām is Trayā-supa.

original: don gcig gi'o //
analyzed: don gcig gi'o //
translated: The one meaning.

original: mi zad pa'i sgrub pa las aata las aam ste lnga pa ma yin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mi zad pa'i sgrub pa las aata las aam ste lnga pa ma yin pa'i 'o //
translated: The Am of the Atas is Atā-am.

original: gsum pa dang bdun pa dag gi yang na'o //
analyzed: gsum pa dang bdun pa dag gi yang na'o //
translated: The Nas of the Tṛtīya and Saptamās is Tṛtīya-nas and Saptamā-nas.

original: rigs gcig la mang po nyid do //
analyzed: rigs gcig la mang po nyid do //
translated: The Bahuvrīhi of the Eka-jātis is Eka-jāti-bahuvrīhi.

original: goo ra ba la'ang ngo //
analyzed: goo ra ba la'ang ngo //
translated: The Gaurāśvas is Gaurāśva.

original: aa smad las gnyis dag kyang ngo ;
analyzed: aa smad las gnyis dag kyang ngo ;
translated: The Dvayas is Dvaya.

original: ; phalgu n'i: proshtha pa da rnams kyang rgyu skar la'o //
analyzed: ; phalgu n'i: proshtha pa da rnams kyang rgyu skar la'o //
translated: The Phalguni-proṣṭha-padas are also in the nakṣatras.

original: rgyal dang nab so dag las rgyu skar la ste dang gi don la mang po nyid dang gnyis do bim sha ti sogs las aa n'a britti la gcig nyid do //
analyzed: rgyal dang nab so dag las rgyu skar la ste dang gi don la mang po nyid dang gnyis do bim sha ti sogs las aa n'a britti la gcig nyid do //
translated: The Nakṣatras from the Jyeṣṭha and Mūla are Nakṣatra-dvaya. The Bahuvrīhi of the Bṛhat-sāman is Bṛhat-sāman-bahuvrīhi.

original: aapa d'a ra dza la ka: si ka ta sogs las mang po min pa nyid kyang mang po nyid do //
analyzed: aapa d'a ra dza la ka: si ka ta sogs las mang po min pa nyid kyang mang po nyid do //
translated: The many are also the many in the case of apadarajala, sikata, etc.

original: zhes pa legs par grags pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs gsum pa'i rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: zhes pa legs par grags pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs gsum pa'i rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the third line of the third chapter in the well-known Manjushri's Grammar.

original: // / bud med la'o //
analyzed: // / bud med la'o //
translated: In the case of a woman.

original: ri na: auka: aita las d'i pa'o //
analyzed: ri na: auka: aita las d'i pa'o //
translated: From ri na, uk, ita, la, da, pa.

original: aanytsa las so //🔽kha ra tsa las ba @161a * //
analyzed: aanytsa las so // kha ra tsa las ba @161a * //
translated: From anyac.

original: na dang ra 'ang ngo //
analyzed: na dang ra 'ang ngo //
translated: From kharac, va and ra.

original: don gzhan la yang na'o //
analyzed: don gzhan la yang na'o //
translated: Also na in another meaning.

original: p'a da las aa n'u tsa la'o //
analyzed: p'a da las aa n'u tsa la'o //
translated: From pada, anucala.

original: a'u dhas las na 'ang ngo //
analyzed: a'u dhas las na 'ang ngo //
translated: From audhas, na.

original: d'a man las grangs dang po las so //
analyzed: d'a man las grangs dang po las so //
translated: From daman, number.

original: h'a ya na las ba yas la'o //
analyzed: h'a ya na las ba yas la'o //
translated: From hayana, baya.

original: aa nu las so //
analyzed: aa nu las so //
translated: From anu.

original: man las ma yin no //
analyzed: man las ma yin no //
translated: Not from man.

original: de dag las d'a pa'o //🔽aatsa sogs dang aata las t'a pa'o //
analyzed: de dag las d'a pa'o // aatsa sogs dang aata las t'a pa'o //
translated: From them, dapa.🔽From ac etc. and ata, tapa.

original: yang las so //
analyzed: yang las so //
translated: Also from ya.

original: rang don la'o //
analyzed: rang don la'o //
translated: In one's own purpose.

original: tita: bha aan: aanya: thaka: thanya: nanya: snanya: las so //
analyzed: tita: bha aan: aanya: thaka: thanya: nanya: snanya: las so //
translated: From ti, bha, ana, anya, thaka, thana, nya, sanya.

original: bu rgyud la yanya: las sha dang aa ba ta las ma yin no //
analyzed: bu rgyud la yanya: las sha dang aa ba ta las ma yin no //
translated: In the case of a son's lineage, from yanya, sha, and from avad, not.

original: sh'a yang na dag go //
analyzed: sh'a yang na dag go //
translated: or śa.

original: sha ka la'i mtha' las lo hi ti sogs las so //
analyzed: sha ka la'i mtha' las lo hi ti sogs las so //
translated: From śaka, the end of the word, from lohita, etc.

analyzed: kshu tra ka ma la ba las sde'i ming la'o //

original: go tra auksha: aushtra: au ra: bhra r'a dza r'a dza pu tra bat+sa: briddha aadzalas lunya'o //
analyzed: go tra auksha: aushtra: au ra: bhra r'a dza r'a dza pu tra bat+sa: briddha aadzalas lunya'o //
translated: From go, uṣṇa, uṣṭra, uru, bhṛ, rāja, rāja-putra, vaṭsa, and bṛddha, the last.

original: ke d'a ra las yanya 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ke d'a ra las yanya 'ang ngo //
translated: From kedāra, the last.

original: ka pa tsi na las kyang tha ka'o //
analyzed: ka pa tsi na las kyang tha ka'o //
translated: From kapicin, the last.

original: hasti: aa tsitto rnams las so //
analyzed: hasti: aa tsitto rnams las so //
translated: From hasti, acitta, and so on.

original: dhi nu nanya med pa las so //
analyzed: dhi nu nanya med pa las so //
translated: from the absence of the dhinu.

original: ga ni k'a: br'ahma na: m'a na ba: ba dra b'a las yanya'o //
analyzed: ga ni k'a: br'ahma na: m'a na ba: ba dra b'a las yanya'o //
translated: Ga is ka, brahma, mana, vadrava, and yati.

original: ke sha las yang na'o //
analyzed: ke sha las yang na'o //
translated: Ke is yati.

original: aa shva las tsha'o //
analyzed: aa shva las tsha'o //
translated: A is asva, tsa,

original: pr'arsh'i: brishthdya aa h'i na dag mchod sbyin la'o //
analyzed: pr'arsh'i: brishthdya aa h'i na dag mchod sbyin la'o //
translated: parashva, brishadya, and ahina.

original: b'a ta las a'u la'o //
analyzed: b'a ta las a'u la'o //
translated: Va is ula.

original: b'a sha la sogs rnams las ytana'o //
analyzed: b'a sha la sogs rnams las ytana'o //
translated: Va, etc. are yati.

original: go dang ra tha las tra k'a dyoo 'ang ngo //
analyzed: go dang ra tha las tra k'a dyoo 'ang ngo //
translated: Go and ratha are tra, etc.

original: kha la sogs las ai ni'o //
analyzed: kha la sogs las ai ni'o //
translated: Kha, etc. are ini.

original: gr'a ma: dza na: ba dza bantu: sa h'a ya las tala'o //
analyzed: gr'a ma: dza na: ba dza bantu: sa h'a ya las tala'o //
translated: Grama, jana, and vaja are sah.

original: poo ru: she ya: kri ta hi te: ba dha: bi k'a ra la'ang ngo //
analyzed: poo ru: she ya: kri ta hi te: ba dha: bi k'a ra la'ang ngo //
translated: Poura, sheya, krita, hita, vadha, and vikara are also.

original: pi tri bya: m'a tu la pi t'a ma ha: m'a t'a ma ha rnams so //
analyzed: pi tri bya: m'a tu la pi t'a ma ha: m'a t'a ma ha rnams so //
translated: Pitri, matu, pitr, and matr are ma.

original: aa pi las dugdhe: sho dha du sha: ma r'i sha 'ang ngo //
analyzed: aa pi las dugdhe: sho dha du sha: ma r'i sha 'ang ngo //
translated: Api is dugdhe, shodhu, and marish.

original: ti la las panydzi pe dzoo: neeshpha lya la'o //
analyzed: ti la las panydzi pe dzoo: neeshpha lya la'o //
translated: Tila is panjip, jyo, and neishphalya.

original: yul la bstan pa la'o //
analyzed: yul la bstan pa la'o //
translated: It is taught for the country.

original: r'a dza ni sogs rnams las bunya'o //
analyzed: r'a dza ni sogs rnams las bunya'o //
translated: Rajani, etc. are bunya.

original: aee shu k'a ri bhoo ri k'i sogs las bhakta la: bi dha la dag go //
analyzed: aee shu k'a ri bhoo ri k'i sogs las bhakta la: bi dha la dag go //
translated: bakti, vidhi.

original: ni p'a se ti ming la'o //
analyzed: ni p'a se ti ming la'o //
translated: nipasati, in the name.

original: mi ring bar gyur pa la'o //
analyzed: mi ring bar gyur pa la'o //
translated: na dīrghaṃ bhavati, it does not become long.

original: de yis char pa la'o /
analyzed: de yis char pa la'o /
translated: tena varṣaṃ bhavati, it rains by him.

original: de 'di la yod pa'o //🔽k'a sha: a'a r'i he na: kri sh'a shva sogs las ai la bunya tshan bzhi rnams la'o //
analyzed: de 'di la yod pa'o // k'a sha: a'a r'i he na: kri sh'a shva sogs las ai la bunya tshan bzhi rnams la'o //
translated: tatra idam asti, it exists in this.🔽kāśaḥ, ārahe, kṛśāśva, etc.

original: ri shya ba la aashma tri na karna sogs rnams las ka: ya: ra: sa: sanyi rnams so //
analyzed: ri shya ba la aashma tri na karna sogs rnams las ka: ya: ra: sa: sanyi rnams so //
translated: ṛṣya, bala, aśman, tri, karṇa, etc.

original: pra ga di ku mu nga ba r'a ha su tam ga ma sogs rnams las /
analyzed: pra ga di ku mu nga ba r'a ha su tam ga ma sogs rnams las /
translated: praga, dik, kumuda, rāhu, sutāṅga, etc.

original: @163a * // nyya: thak kak:ainya rnams so //
analyzed: @163a * // nyya: thak kak:ainya rnams so //
translated: nyā, thaka, kak, iṇa.🔽kumuda, sakhi, saṃkāśa, pakṣa, prekṣa, etc.

original: ku mu da: sa khi: sam k'a sha: paksha: preksha: sogs rnams las: than dhanya nya phaka: ae ni rnams so //🔽autka ra sogs las thung ngu dang na dbyi ba dang kuk kyang ngo //
analyzed: ku mu da: sa khi: sam k'a sha: paksha: preksha: sogs rnams las: than dhanya nya phaka: ae ni rnams so // autka ra sogs las thung ngu dang na dbyi ba dang kuk kyang ngo //
translated: utkara, etc.

original: dza na ba da la 'jig go //
analyzed: dza na ba da la 'jig go //
translated: jana vadati, it is said.

original: ba ra na sogs las so //
analyzed: ba ra na sogs las so //
translated: varana, etc.

original: sharka r'a las so //🔽zag dang tsha dag go //
analyzed: sharka r'a las so //🔽zag dang tsha dag go //
translated: śarkara.🔽saka, tathā.

original: na d'i la ma tu pa'o //🔽ma dhu sogs rnams las so //🔽ma hi sha: su mu da: na da: pe ta sa rnams las dita'o //🔽na ta sh'a da las kyang ba la rtsa'o //🔽shi kh'a las so //🔽zhes pa legs par grags pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs bzhi pa'i rkang pa dang po rdzogs so /🔽// / ngas las bu rgyud la'o //🔽aata las ainya'o //🔽bam ga sogs las b'a hu sogs rnams las so //🔽aa mi too dzas sam bh'u yas aambhas las dbyi ba'ang ngo //🔽by'as sogs rnams la aa ka'ang ngo //🔽bi da sogs las aanya ste ba ra shu'ang pha rol bud med la so //🔽drang srong las rigs la'o //🔽garga sogs rnams las yanya'o //🔽ma dhu ma bhu: dag las br'ahma na koo shi ka las so //🔽ka pi: bo dha las a'ang+gi ra sa la'o //
analyzed: na d'i la ma tu pa'o // ma dhu sogs rnams las so // ma hi sha: su mu da: na da: pe ta sa rnams las dita'o // na ta sh'a da las kyang ba la rtsa'o // shi kh'a las so // zhes pa legs par grags pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs bzhi pa'i rkang pa dang po rdzogs so / // / ngas las bu rgyud la'o // aata las ainya'o // bam ga sogs las b'a hu sogs rnams las so // aa mi too dzas sam bh'u yas aambhas las dbyi ba'ang ngo // by'as sogs rnams la aa ka'ang ngo // bi da sogs las aanya ste ba ra shu'ang pha rol bud med la so // drang srong las rigs la'o // garga sogs rnams las yanya'o // ma dhu ma bhu: dag las br'ahma na koo shi ka las so // ka pi: bo dha las a'ang+gi ra sa la'o //
translated: Nādī, lamatu.🔽From madhu, etc.🔽From mahis, sumu, nad, peṭa, sara, dit.🔽From nat, śād, also balart.🔽From śikha.🔽Thus ends the first quarter of the fourth chapter in the well-known Mañjuśrī's Grammar.🔽I, from la, bu, and gu.🔽At, from la, iṇ.🔽From vaṅga, etc., vāhu, etc.🔽From amit, ojas, sambhu, ambha, i.🔽From vya, etc., a.🔽From vid, etc., aṇ, also varṣa, in the case of a woman.🔽From ṛṣi, to a class of works.🔽From garga, etc., yaṇ.🔽From madhu, ambhu, brāhmaṇa.🔽From kauśika, kapil, bodha, aṅgira.🔽

original: bud med la 'jig go //
analyzed: bud med la 'jig go //
translated: [The word] woman [is formed].

original: aa shva sogs rnams las yanya'o //
analyzed: aa shva sogs rnams las yanya'o //
translated: [The word] yava [is formed] from aśva and so on.

original: sh'a pa: dz'a ta a'atre ya bha ra dva dza: bharka: las a'a tre ya /
analyzed: sh'a pa: dz'a ta a'atre ya bha ra dva dza: bharka: las a'a tre ya /
translated: [The word] atrīya [is formed] from śāpa, jāta, atrī, bharadvāja, and bṛhat.

original: pumbha ra dva dza: a'a: tre ya tre gartta rnams la'o //
analyzed: pumbha ra dva dza: a'a: tre ya tre gartta rnams la'o //
translated: [The word] atrīya [is formed] from pum, bharadvāja, a, atrī, and garga.

original: kunydza sogs rnams las phyanya'o //
analyzed: kunydza sogs rnams las phyanya'o //
translated: [The word] phyanya [is formed] from kuñja and so on.

original: bud med la mang po rnams la'ang phaka'o //
analyzed: bud med la mang po rnams la'ang phaka'o //
translated: [The word] phak [is formed] for many women.

original: na t'a sogs las so //
analyzed: na t'a sogs las so //
translated: [The word] so [is formed] from natā and so on.

original: krishna: aagni sharma: ra na las bram ze dang / brishi'i tshogs dang gnas 'jog la'o //
analyzed: krishna: aagni sharma: ra na las bram ze dang / brishi'i tshogs dang gnas 'jog la'o //
translated: [The word] brāhmaṇa [is formed] from kṛṣṇa, agni, śarman, and rana.

original: ha ri ta sogs las aanya las so //
analyzed: ha ri ta sogs las aanya las so //
translated: [The word] aṅga [is formed] from hari and so on.

original: yanya aanya las so //
analyzed: yanya aanya las so //
translated: [The word] aṅga [is formed] from yava and aṅga.

original: shu na ka: darba sha radba ta las b'at+sya aa gr'a ya na bh'arga ba la'o //
analyzed: shu na ka: darba sha radba ta las b'at+sya aa gr'a ya na bh'arga ba la'o //
translated: [The word] vātsya [is formed] from śaṅku, darbha, and vardhana.

original: barba ta dzi banta las yang na'o //
analyzed: barba ta dzi banta las yang na'o //
translated: [The word] yaṅga [is formed] from bharata and jīvanta.

original: dro na las so //
analyzed: dro na las so //
translated: [The word] droṇa [is formed] from droṇa.

original: shi ba sogs las aana'o //
analyzed: shi ba sogs las aana'o //
translated: [The word] ana [is formed] from śiva and so on.

original: priddha min pa las chu bo dang mi'i mid las so //🔽krunytsa @163b dang ko ki la dag las so //
analyzed: priddha min pa las chu bo dang mi'i mid las so // krunytsa @163b dang ko ki la dag las so //
translated: [The word] nadī [is formed] from pṛddhi and min.🔽[The word] kuñja [is formed] from kṛñca and kokila.

original: ri shi ku ru brishni aandha ka las so //
analyzed: ri shi ku ru brishni aandha ka las so //
translated: [The word] aṅga [is formed] from riśika, kuru, and bṛśa.

original: grangs dang sam dang bha dra sogs las m'a tri las au aa pa'ang ngo //
analyzed: grangs dang sam dang bha dra sogs las m'a tri las au aa pa'ang ngo //
translated: from Saṃ, Bhadra, etc.

original: ka n+ya las ka n'i na'ang ngo //
analyzed: ka n+ya las ka n'i na'ang ngo //
translated: from Kaṇyā, Kaṇīna also.

original: shung+ga: tstsha ga la bi karna las bh'a ra: dv'a dza b'at+sya: a'a tre ya rnams la'o //
analyzed: shung+ga: tstsha ga la bi karna las bh'a ra: dv'a dza b'at+sya: a'a tre ya rnams la'o //
translated: from Śuṅga, Caṅgala, Vikarṇa, Bhāra, Dvājava, Vatsya, Ātreya.

original: p'i l'a las yang na'o //
analyzed: p'i l'a las yang na'o //
translated: from Pālā, again.

original: mand'u ka las dhaka'ang ngo //
analyzed: mand'u ka las dhaka'ang ngo //
translated: from Maṇḍūka, Dha also.

original: str'i rnams las so //
analyzed: str'i rnams las so //
translated: from the Satrī.

original: pa da b'a las bri sha la'o //
analyzed: pa da b'a las bri sha la'o //
translated: from Pada, Vāsa,

original: aa tsa gnyis las so //
analyzed: aa tsa gnyis las so //
translated: from the two Ajas.

original: aita las aa nanyilas so //
analyzed: aita las aa nanyilas so //
translated: from Iṭa, Ana.

original: shu bha sogs rnams las so //
analyzed: shu bha sogs rnams las so //
translated: from Śubha, etc.

original: bi karna dang ku s'i ta ka las k'a shya ba la'o //
analyzed: bi karna dang ku s'i ta ka las k'a shya ba la'o //
translated: from Vikarṇa, Kuśītaka, Kāśyapa.

original: bh'u las buka 'ang ngo //
analyzed: bh'u las buka 'ang ngo //
translated: from Bhū, Buk also.

original: ka ly'a n'i sogs rnams la ai nang 'o //
analyzed: ka ly'a n'i sogs rnams la ai nang 'o //
translated: in the Kalyāṇīs, etc.

original: ku la t'a las so //
analyzed: ku la t'a las so //
translated: from Kulatā.

original: tsa ta ka las ae raka'o //
analyzed: tsa ta ka las ae raka'o //
translated: from Cataka, Erak.

original: bud med la 'jig go //
analyzed: bud med la 'jig go //
translated: in the women.

original: dz'anta: p'anta las a'a raka'o //
analyzed: dz'anta: p'anta las a'a raka'o //
translated: from Jānta, Pānta, Ārak.

original: go dh'a las ae rag 'ang ngo //
analyzed: go dh'a las ae rag 'ang ngo //
translated: from Godhā, Erak also.

original: kshu tr'a rnams las so //
analyzed: kshu tr'a rnams las so //
translated: from the Kṣutras.

original: bhr'a tr'i: bya: 'o //
analyzed: bhr'a tr'i: bya: 'o //
translated: from Bhartrī, Bya.

original: tsha'o sva sri las so //
analyzed: tsha'o sva sri las so //
translated: from Tṣa, Sva.

original: bi tram m'a tri sngon ma las tshana'o //
analyzed: bi tram m'a tri sngon ma las tshana'o //
translated: Vitra and matra are from the previous.

original: dhaka la dbyi'o //
analyzed: dhaka la dbyi'o //
translated: Dhaka is from dvika.

original: ksha tra las rigs la gha'o //
analyzed: ksha tra las rigs la gha'o //
translated: Ksha is from kshatra.

original: r'a dzan las yata'o //
analyzed: r'a dzan las yata'o //
translated: Yata is from raja.

original: ma nu las aanya dang shuka'ang ngo //
analyzed: ma nu las aanya dang shuka'ang ngo //
translated: Ana and shuka are from manushya.

original: shva shu ra las la'o //
analyzed: shva shu ra las la'o //
translated: La is from shva and rusa.

original: ku la las dhakanya'ang ngo //
analyzed: ku la las dhakanya'ang ngo //
translated: Dhaknya is from kula.

original: de'i mtha' las kha'ang ngo//
analyzed: de'i mtha' las kha'ang ngo//
translated: Ksha is from its end.

original: dur las dhaka yab na'o //
analyzed: dur las dhaka yab na'o //
translated: Dhakayava is from dur.

original: ma h'e ku la las aanya khanya dag go //
analyzed: ma h'e ku la las aanya khanya dag go //
translated: Ana and ksha are from mahekula.

original: grishti sogs tsa tushpa rnams las dhanya'o //
analyzed: grishti sogs tsa tushpa rnams las dhanya'o //
translated: Dhana is from grihni and others.

original: ra ba t'i sogs rnams las thaka'o //
analyzed: ra ba t'i sogs rnams las thaka'o //
translated: Thaka is from ravadi and others.

original: rigs las bud med la smad pa la na tsa'o //
analyzed: rigs las bud med la smad pa la na tsa'o //
translated: Nacha is from kula for a woman.

original: soo b'i ra rnams la'o //
analyzed: soo b'i ra rnams la'o //
translated: So is from soavi.

original: phanyi las tsha'ang ngo //
analyzed: phanyi las tsha'ang ngo //
translated: Tsha is from phani.

original: ph'anna kri te las na dang la nye dag go //
analyzed: ph'anna kri te las na dang la nye dag go //
translated: Na and la are from phanikrita.

original: mi ma ta las so //
analyzed: mi ma ta las so //
translated: So is from mimata.

original: ku ru sogs rnams las nya'o //
analyzed: ku ru sogs rnams las nya'o //
translated: Nya is from kuru and others.

original: sa mr'adza las rgyal rigs la'o //
analyzed: sa mr'adza las rgyal rigs la'o //
translated: Ksha is from samraj.

original: se n'a'i mtha' dang k'a ru laksha na las ainya'ang ngo //
analyzed: se n'a'i mtha' dang k'a ru laksha na las ainya'ang ngo //
translated: Inya is from senai and karu lakshana.

original: ti ka sogs rnams las phi nya'o //
analyzed: ti ka sogs rnams las phi nya'o //
translated: Pini is from tika and others.

original: dgu ko sha la: karm'a r'a tstsha ga bram 'o las auta 'ang ngo //
analyzed: dgu ko sha la: karm'a r'a tstsha ga bram 'o las auta 'ang ngo //
translated: In kośala and karma-rāṭ the a is elided.

original: aan las aatsa gnyis pa las so //
analyzed: aan las aatsa gnyis pa las so //
translated: In an the second a is elided.

original: tyata sogs rnams las yang na'o //
analyzed: tyata sogs rnams las yang na'o //
translated: In tyaja and so forth, a is elided.

original: aa go tra las phanyi'o //
analyzed: aa go tra las phanyi'o //
translated: In agotra the a is elided.

original: braddhi las phanyi'o //
analyzed: braddhi las phanyi'o //
translated: In baddha the a is elided.

original: b'a ki na sogs rnams la kuta'ang ngo //
analyzed: b'a ki na sogs rnams la kuta'ang ngo //
translated: In vākya and so forth, a is elided.

original: pu tra'i mtha' las so //
analyzed: pu tra'i mtha' las so //
translated: In putra the final a is elided.

original: dza na pa da ming @164a * //🔽las rgyal rigs las aanya ste r'a dzan ya'ang ngo //
analyzed: dza na pa da ming @164a * // las rgyal rigs las aanya ste r'a dzan ya'ang ngo //

original: g'an ri sha we ya las so //
analyzed: g'an ri sha we ya las so //
translated: In gaṇarīṣi the a is elided.

original: briddha las nyang 'o //
analyzed: briddha las nyang 'o //
translated: In brīdhi the a is elided.

original: ko sha la: a'a dz'a da las so //
analyzed: ko sha la: a'a dz'a da las so //
translated: In kośala the a is elided.

original: aa tsa gnyis pa las aana'o //
analyzed: aa tsa gnyis pa las aana'o //
translated: In an the second a is elided.

original: n'a di: ku ru dag las nya'o //
analyzed: n'a di: ku ru dag las nya'o //
translated: In nādi and kurū the a is elided.

original: p'antu las yana'o //
analyzed: p'antu las yana'o //
translated: In pāṇḍu the a is elided.

original: sh'a lba: aa ba ya ga pra tya gra tha: k'a la k'u ta /
analyzed: sh'a lba: aa ba ya ga pra tya gra tha: k'a la k'u ta /
translated: In śālaṅkāyana the a is elided.

original: aashma ka mas ainya'o //🔽bud med la /🔽ku ru: kunti: aa panti rnams las so //
analyzed: aashma ka mas ainya'o // bud med la / ku ru: kunti: aa panti rnams las so //
translated: In aśvamedha the a is elided.🔽In prācya and so forth, the a is elided.

original: pr'a tsya bharga sogs las aata las so //
analyzed: pr'a tsya bharga sogs las aata las so //
translated: In bharga and so forth, the a is elided.

original: aanya aanya las mang po rnams la bud med min pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: aanya aanya las mang po rnams la bud med min pa rnams la'o //
translated: Aṇya, aṇya, for many, for those who are not women.

original: kundi na'o // nyang sogs las so //
analyzed: kundi na'o // nyang sogs las so //
translated: Kundina, from nyāṅ and so on.

original: yaska sogs rnams las so //
analyzed: yaska sogs rnams las so //
translated: Yska and so on.

original: aa tri bhr'i gu kut+sa ba shashthe go tam: aang+gi: ras rnams so //
analyzed: aa tri bhr'i gu kut+sa ba shashthe go tam: aang+gi: ras rnams so //
translated: Atrī, bharī, gu, kuṭsa, vaśa, śaṣṭha, gotama, aṅgi, for the Ṛṣis.

original: aa gastya'i aa gastyi 'ang ngo //🔽aatsa mang po las br'a tsya las ainya'o //
analyzed: aa gastya'i aa gastyi 'ang ngo // aatsa mang po las br'a tsya las ainya'o //
translated: Agastya, agastya.🔽Aṭ, many, from brāc, ya, iṇ.

original: au ba ka sogs rnams las so //
analyzed: au ba ka sogs rnams las so //
translated: Upaka and so on.

original: tika ki ta ba sogs rnams las dang gi don la'o //
analyzed: tika ki ta ba sogs rnams las dang gi don la'o //
translated: Tikkitava and so on, for the meaning of and.

original: go ba yu ban sogs brgyad rnams min pa las so //
analyzed: go ba yu ban sogs brgyad rnams min pa las so //
translated: Gopā, yubandhu and so on, for the eight that are not.

original: dzi ta'i aa tsal gong du'o //
analyzed: dzi ta'i aa tsal gong du'o //
translated: Jita, aṭ, above.

original: yu ban la 'jig go //
analyzed: yu ban la 'jig go //
translated: Yubandhu, destroyed.

original: phak phanyi dag go //
analyzed: phak phanyi dag go //
translated: Phaṭ, phaṇi, pure.

original: bram ze ma yin pa las so //
analyzed: bram ze ma yin pa las so //
translated: Not a brahmin.

original: bee la sogs rnams las so //
analyzed: bee la sogs rnams las so //
translated: Vela and so on.

original: pr'a tsya las ainya dang / too lva ni sogs dang bha ra ta ma yin pa las so //
analyzed: pr'a tsya las ainya dang / too lva ni sogs dang bha ra ta ma yin pa las so //
translated: From brāc, iṇ, and from tolava and so on, not Bharata.

original: ni dang a'arsha dang nyid las aan: aanyi dag go //
analyzed: ni dang a'arsha dang nyid las aan: aanyi dag go //
translated: Ni, ārṣa, and from itself, an, ani.

original: ae ka las go tra la'o //
analyzed: ae ka las go tra la'o //
translated: From eka, for gotra.

original: go tra las yu ban la'o //
analyzed: go tra las yu ban la'o //
translated: From gotra, for yubandhu.

original: bu rgyud la bu'i bu sogs la go tram 'o //
analyzed: bu rgyud la bu'i bu sogs la go tram 'o //
translated: To a son, to a grandson, etc., is go-tram.

original: tsa: turtha sogs bud med 'tsho ba min pa ni /
analyzed: tsa: turtha sogs bud med 'tsho ba min pa ni /
translated: To a woman, to a non-living woman, etc., is

original: rigs dang na tshod do //🔽bh'a ta ri ksh'a ya si /
analyzed: rigs dang na tshod do // bh'a ta ri ksh'a ya si /
translated: caste and age.🔽 To to a cow, etc., is bha-ta-ri-kṣāya-si.

original: dzi bat gzhan las bsdus pa dang bcas pa gnas brtan la yang na'o //
analyzed: dzi bat gzhan las bsdus pa dang bcas pa gnas brtan la yang na'o //
translated: To to a sthavira, etc., is ji-vat-saṃbhūta-na.

original: mchod pa la go tram'o //
analyzed: mchod pa la go tram'o //
translated: To to a pūjā, etc., is go-tram.

original: yu ban las smad pa la'o //
analyzed: yu ban las smad pa la'o //
translated: To to a low person, etc., is yū-van.

original: zhes pa s'a dhu k'irtti'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs bzhi pa'i rkang pa gnyis pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: zhes pa s'a dhu k'irtti'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs bzhi pa'i rkang pa gnyis pa rdzogs so /
translated: Thus ends the second line of the fourth chapter in Mañjuśrī's Phonetics composed by Sādhu Kirti.

original: // / lhag ma la'o //
analyzed: // / lhag ma la'o //
translated: To to the rest, etc., is la.

original: r'ashtra las gha'o //
analyzed: r'ashtra las gha'o //
translated: To to an enemy, etc., is gha.

original: p'ar: aa p'a ra p'ar las kha'o //🔽gr'a ma las yata: khanya dag go //
analyzed: p'ar: aa p'a ra p'ar las kha'o // gr'a ma las yata: khanya dag go //
translated: To to a pāra, etc., is kha.🔽 To to a grāma, etc., is ya-t-kha-ṇḍa.

original: kart'i: sogs las kyang dhakanya'o //🔽ku la kukshi: gr'i b'a //
analyzed: kart'i: sogs las kyang dhakanya'o // ku la kukshi: gr'i b'a //
translated: To to a kartṛ, etc., is dha-kṣa.🔽 To to a kula, etc., is ku-kṣi-grīva.

original: @164b rnams la khyi dang ral gri dang rgyan la'o //
analyzed: @164b rnams la khyi dang ral gri dang rgyan la'o //
translated: To to a dog, etc., is khaḍga-bhūṣaṇa.

original: na d'i sogs las dhaka'o //
analyzed: na d'i sogs las dhaka'o //
translated: To to a nādi, etc., is dha.

original: rakshi n'a bashts'at bu ras las tyaka'o //
analyzed: rakshi n'a bashts'at bu ras las tyaka'o //
translated: To to a rakṣiṇā, etc., is tyak.

original: bahl'i: aurdri baddhi k'a pi sh'i rnams las shphaka'o //
analyzed: bahl'i: aurdri baddhi k'a pi sh'i rnams las shphaka'o //
translated: To to a bhalli, etc., is śaphaka.

original: rangku las srog chags la'o ;🔽/ pr'a ka: aa b'aka: au daka: pra tya kad'i ba las yata'o //
analyzed: rangku las srog chags la'o ; / pr'a ka: aa b'aka: au daka: pra tya kad'i ba las yata'o //
translated: From ra, ku, and la, [comes] a living being.🔽From pra, ā, u, and du, [comes] a part.

original: ka pa las thaka'o //🔽ballu la buka'o //
analyzed: ka pa las thaka'o // ballu la buka'o //
translated: From ka, pa, and la, [comes] a hand.🔽From bu, lu, and la, [comes] a mouth.

original: kva aa ma: ai ha tra: tas las stya pa'o //
analyzed: kva aa ma: ai ha tra: tas las stya pa'o //
translated: From ta, sya, and pa, [comes] a man.

original: aee sha ma hyas: shvas las so //
analyzed: aee sha ma hyas: shvas las so //
translated: From śa, ma, and ha, [comes] a god.

original: na dang nashi las rtag pa dang gnas pa dag la'o //🔽aa ra nya las na'o //
analyzed: na dang nashi las rtag pa dang gnas pa dag la'o // aa ra nya las na'o //
translated: From na and ṇa, [comes] permanence and stability.🔽From a, ra, and nya, [comes] a woman.

original: d'u ri dang autta ra las ae tya a'a ha nya dag go //
analyzed: d'u ri dang autta ra las ae tya a'a ha nya dag go //
translated: From du and uttara, [comes] a woman.

original: r'u pa phyi ma'i tshig las nya'o //
analyzed: r'u pa phyi ma'i tshig las nya'o //
translated: From the word rūpa in the next [verse], [comes] a man.

original: phyogs sngon ma dang ma dre ta ra las ming ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: phyogs sngon ma dang ma dre ta ra las ming ma yin pa la'o //
translated: From the previous direction and madreta, [comes] a name.

original: sha ka la sogs las go tra la sogs aanyi las so //
analyzed: sha ka la sogs las go tra la sogs aanyi las so //
translated: From śaka and so on, [comes] a gotrā and so on.

original: aa tsa gnyis pa dang pr'a tsya las so //
analyzed: aa tsa gnyis pa dang pr'a tsya las so //
translated: From the second a and prācī, [comes] a direction.

original: briddha las tsha'o //🔽bha bata las naka tsha dag go //
analyzed: briddha las tsha'o // bha bata las naka tsha dag go //
translated: From bṛddhi, [comes] a tsa.🔽From bhavati, [comes] a nakṣatra.

original: au las yul las thanya'o //
analyzed: au las yul las thanya'o //
translated: From u, [comes] a country.

original: briddha las pr'a tsya las so //
analyzed: briddha las pr'a tsya las so //
translated: From bṛddhi, [comes] a prācī.

original: k'a shi sogs las ai kanya 'ang ngo //
analyzed: k'a shi sogs las ai kanya 'ang ngo //
translated: From kāśi and so on, [comes] an ikañ.

original: k'a la p'urba sogs sngon can las so //
analyzed: k'a la p'urba sogs sngon can las so //
translated: From kālapūrva and so on, [comes] a pūrva.

original: b'a h'i ka nr'a ma las so //
analyzed: b'a h'i ka nr'a ma las so //
translated: from Bāhika-narma.

original: au sh'in ra rnams la'o //
analyzed: au sh'in ra rnams la'o //
translated: from Uśīnara.

original: prastha ba ha: bu ba'i mtha' dang ya mtha' nye mya ngam gyi don las bunya'o //
analyzed: prastha ba ha: bu ba'i mtha' dang ya mtha' nye mya ngam gyi don las bunya'o //
translated: from Prasthā-vaha, the end of the word and the end of ya, near the desert, from bunya.

original: ra mtha' nye aita las pr'a tsya las so //
analyzed: ra mtha' nye aita las pr'a tsya las so //
translated: from the end of ra, near ait, from pracya.

original: ljongs rnams las so //
analyzed: ljongs rnams las so //
translated: from the countries.

original: mang po nyid kyi yul rnams las so //
analyzed: mang po nyid kyi yul rnams las so //
translated: from the many countries.

original: su sarba aargta dika rnams las so //
analyzed: su sarba aargta dika rnams las so //
translated: from all the directions.

original: k'atstsha: aagni bakt'a: bartta tshig phyi ma dang dh'u ma sogs rnams las so //
analyzed: k'atstsha: aagni bakt'a: bartta tshig phyi ma dang dh'u ma sogs rnams las so //
translated: from agni-vaktra, from vartta, from the next word, from dhūma, etc.

original: sa mu dralas noo //
analyzed: sa mu dralas noo //
translated: from samudra.

original: ma nu shya dag las so //
analyzed: ma nu shya dag las so //
translated: from manusya.

original: na ga ra las kushs'a dang pr'a b'i na dag las so //
analyzed: na ga ra las kushs'a dang pr'a b'i na dag las so //
translated: from nagara, from kusha, from parāvāna.

original: aa ra nya las pa thi n+y'a ya: aa dhy'a ya: hasti na ra ba h'a sa ra rnams la'o //
analyzed: aa ra nya las pa thi n+y'a ya: aa dhy'a ya: hasti na ra ba h'a sa ra rnams la'o //
translated: from aranya, from pathinya, from adhyāya, from hasti, from naravāhana.

original: go ma ya la yang na'o //
analyzed: go ma ya la yang na'o //
translated: from gomukha.

original: ku ru dang yu gandha ra las so //
analyzed: ku ru dang yu gandha ra las so //
translated: from kuru and yugandhara.

original: bri dzi dang ma dra las ka na'o //
analyzed: bri dzi dang ma dra las ka na'o //
translated: from brihat and madra, from kana.

original: ka mtha' nye las aa na'o //
analyzed: ka mtha' nye las aa na'o //
translated: from the end of ka, near, from ana.

original: katstsha sogs rnams las so //
analyzed: katstsha sogs rnams las so //
translated: from kṣa, etc.

original: ni dang sthe las bunya'o //
analyzed: ni dang sthe las bunya'o //
translated: from ni and sthiti, from bunya.

original: s'a lva dang aa pa d'a ti dag la'o //
analyzed: s'a lva dang aa pa d'a ti dag la'o //
translated: [The word] sālavā is from sāla and avadā.

original: go dang ya ba g'u dag las so //
analyzed: go dang ya ba g'u dag las so //
translated: [The word] goyava is from go and yavagū.

original: ka ta sogs dang pr'o tsya las tshe'o //
analyzed: ka ta sogs dang pr'o tsya las tshe'o //
translated: [The word] kāla is from kata and so on, and prācoṣya.

original: krika na parna las bh'a ra dv'a dza las so //
analyzed: krika na parna las bh'a ra dv'a dza las so //
translated: [The word] bhāradvāja is from kṛkin and parṇa.

original: @165a * // briddha las kanth'a: pa la da: na ga ra: gr'a ma dru da mtha' dang: ka kha mtha' nye las so //
analyzed: @165a * // briddha las kanth'a: pa la da: na ga ra: gr'a ma dru da mtha' dang: ka kha mtha' nye las so //
translated: [The word] kanthā is from bṛhat, palada from nāgara, and grāma from dru.

original: gart'a ga ha sogs rnams las so //
analyzed: gart'a ga ha sogs rnams las so //
translated: [The word] gārhapatya is from gārha and ās.

original: sarba ta las so //
analyzed: sarba ta las so //
translated: [The word] sarvatra is from sarva.

original: aa na ri bee'o //
analyzed: aa na ri bee'o //
translated: [The word] anariva is from anari.

original: mu kha ae ka p'arshva las tas las so //
analyzed: mu kha ae ka p'arshva las tas las so //
translated: [The word] ekapārśva is from mukha and ta.

original: sva pa ra dzan: de ba r'a dza na las kuta'ang ngo //
analyzed: sva pa ra dzan: de ba r'a dza na las kuta'ang ngo //
translated: [The word] svarga is from svarga and jana.

original: pri thi b'i dang: ma dhya las te ma'ang ngo //
analyzed: pri thi b'i dang: ma dhya las te ma'ang ngo //
translated: [The word] madhyama is from prithivī and madhya.

original: ni ba sa ti dang tsa ra na la aan 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ni ba sa ti dang tsa ra na la aan 'ang ngo //
translated: [The word] anva is from niva and asti, and [the word] anva is from caraṇa.

original: be nuka sogs las tshana'o //
analyzed: be nuka sogs las tshana'o //
translated: [The word] vaṃśa is from venuka and so on.

original: yushma aa smad las khanya yang na ste yushm'a ka aasm'a ka dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: yushma aa smad las khanya yang na ste yushm'a ka aasm'a ka dag kyang ngo //
translated: [The word] uṣṇāka is from uṣṇa and as, and [the word] uṣṇāka is from uṣṇam and as.

original: aana'o // ta ba ka: ma ma ka dag gcig la'o //
analyzed: aana'o // ta ba ka: ma ma ka dag gcig la'o //
translated: [The word] anukampā is from anukampā and one.

original: dr'i  pa las aa nu sa mu dra las yanya'o //
analyzed: dr'i  pa las aa nu sa mu dra las yanya'o //
translated: [The word] anuśaya is from anu and samudra.

original: aardha las yata'o //
analyzed: aardha las yata'o //
translated: From ardha, yata.

original: pa ra aa pa ra aa dha ma autta ma sngon ma las so //
analyzed: pa ra aa pa ra aa dha ma autta ma sngon ma las so //
translated: From para, aparadha, uttama.

original: phyogs rnams las tha nya 'ang ngo //
analyzed: phyogs rnams las tha nya 'ang ngo //
translated: From paksa, tanu.

original: grong dang ljongs yul gcig las aanya'ang ngo //
analyzed: grong dang ljongs yul gcig las aanya'ang ngo //
translated: From grāma, janapada, deśa, aṇ.

original: snga ma dang bcas pa las so //
analyzed: snga ma dang bcas pa las so //
translated: From pūrva, saha.

original: dus brjod pa las so //
analyzed: dus brjod pa las so //
translated: From kāla, vacana.

original: sha rang las dang can gyi las la'o //
analyzed: sha rang las dang can gyi las la'o //
translated: From śarīra, śarīra.

original: nad dang chu dag la yang na'o //
analyzed: nad dang chu dag la yang na'o //
translated: From roga and jala, na.

original: sha shvan: ni sh'a: bra do sha las so //
analyzed: sha shvan: ni sh'a: bra do sha las so //
translated: From śubha, śubha.

original: shma sa las tuta'ang ngo //
analyzed: shma sa las tuta'ang ngo //
translated: From śamana, tu.

original: tsi ra pa ru ta: pa r'a ri las na'o //
analyzed: tsi ra pa ru ta: pa r'a ri las na'o //
translated: From ciram, parirakṣaṇa.

original: p'urb'ahna: aa pa r'ahna dag las ta na: ta'o //🔽s'am yam br'ahde: pra ge: tsi ram: grangs med pa las so //
analyzed: p'urb'ahna: aa pa r'ahna dag las ta na: ta'o // s'am yam br'ahde: pra ge: tsi ram: grangs med pa las so //
translated: From pūrva, aparāhṇa, tana.🔽From saṃkhyā, saṃvatsara, prage, ciram.

original: sandhya las dus dang rgyu skar las aana'o //
analyzed: sandhya las dus dang rgyu skar las aana'o //
translated: From saṃdhi, kāla, nakṣatra, ana.

original: sambat+sa ra las 'bras bu dang tshig dag la'o //
analyzed: sambat+sa ra las 'bras bu dang tshig dag la'o //
translated: From saṃvatsara, phala, vacana.

original: he manta las ba ta dbyi ba 'ang ngo //
analyzed: he manta las ba ta dbyi ba 'ang ngo //
translated: From hemanta, vasanta.

original: parsh'a pr'i pra da dag la thaka / ae nya dag go //
analyzed: parsh'a pr'i pra da dag la thaka / ae nya dag go //
translated: From parṣat, parīpāka, thaka.

original: aadsha las aa ba ri tu las kanyni ta'o //
analyzed: aadsha las aa ba ri tu las kanyni ta'o //
translated: From ādhi, āvaritaṃ, kṣaṇitaṃ.

original: a'a di: ma dhya las ma'o //
analyzed: a'a di: ma dhya las ma'o //
translated: From ādi, madhya, mā.

original: aa dhyas aa ba sa las dbyi ba'ang ngo //
analyzed: aa dhyas aa ba sa las dbyi ba'ang ngo //
translated: From adhyas, avas, dvyam.

original: ma dhya las aa ste da ltar ba la'o //
analyzed: ma dhya las aa ste da ltar ba la'o //
translated: From madhya, as, in the present.

original: aa gra aanta: pashtsa las ai ma'o //
analyzed: aa gra aanta: pashtsa las ai ma'o //
translated: From agra, anta, pṛṣṭha, i.

original: zhes pa legs par grags pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs bzhi pa'i rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: zhes pa legs par grags pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs bzhi pa'i rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs so /
translated: Thus ends the third quarter of the fourth chapter in the well-known Mañjuśrī grammar.

original: // / ngi las skye ba la pr'a brisha las thana'o //
analyzed: // / ngi las skye ba la pr'a brisha las thana'o //
translated: From ṅi, birth, paribhāṣā, thānam.

original: sha rang las ming la bunya'o //
analyzed: sha rang las ming la bunya'o //
translated: From śa, from oneself, in the name, bhuñj.

original: p'u rb'a hna aa pa r'ahna a'a dr'a: m'u la: pra do sha: aa bskar las kana'o //
analyzed: p'u rb'a hna aa pa r'ahna a'a dr'a: m'u la: pra do sha: aa bskar las kana'o //
translated: From pūrvāhṇa, aparāhṇa, ardham, mūla, pradoṣa, avasara, kṣaṇam.

original: @165b banthaka'o // sindhu: aa pa ka ra dag las yang na'o //
analyzed: @165b banthaka'o // sindhu: aa pa ka ra dag las yang na'o //
translated: From sindhu, apa, kara, yugam.

original: aa ma dang po ba sya: aa p'a sye dag las ta aa'ang ngo //
analyzed: aa ma dang po ba sya: aa p'a sye dag las ta aa'ang ngo //
translated: From ama, first, vasya, apasyai, tadā.

original: bat+sa sh'a la: aa shvi n'i: mri ga shi ra: aa: bhi dzita: aa shva yuk: sha ta bhi shak rnams las 'jig go / sth'a na'i mtha' la gosh'a la las so //
analyzed: bat+sa sh'a la: aa shvi n'i: mri ga shi ra: aa: bhi dzita: aa shva yuk: sha ta bhi shak rnams las 'jig go / sth'a na'i mtha' la gosh'a la las so //
translated: From sthā at the end, gośāla.

original: kha ra sh'a la las so /
analyzed: kha ra sh'a la las so /
translated: From kara, śāla.

original: ; shra pishth'a: phalgu n'i: aa nu r'a dh'a sv'a ti: tishya pushya pu narbasbu: bi sh'a kha: a'a sh'a dha b'a hu l'a hasta las so //
analyzed: ; shra pishth'a: phalgu n'i: aa nu r'a dh'a sv'a ti: tishya pushya pu narbasbu: bi sh'a kha: a'a sh'a dha b'a hu l'a hasta las so //
translated: From śravaṇa, bhadrapadā, anurādhā, svāti, tiṣya, puṣya, punarvasu, viśākhā, āśleṣā, māghā, hasta.

original: tsi tr'a: droham n'i: re ba t'i: rnams las bud med min pa la yang na'o //
analyzed: tsi tr'a: droham n'i: re ba t'i: rnams las bud med min pa la yang na'o //
translated: From citrā, droṇa, revatī, a also for a woman.

original: bhe sha dza las aan ste dita'o //
analyzed: bhe sha dza las aan ste dita'o //
translated: From bheṣaja, ja and a.

original: shra: bishtha a'a sh'a dha las tstsha na min no ;
analyzed: shra: bishtha a'a sh'a dha las tstsha na min no ;
translated: From śra, viṣṭi, āśleṣā, a and dha not ca.

original: ; de rnams dang kr'ita: labdha kr'i ta ku sha la sogs rnams la'ang ngo //
analyzed: ; de rnams dang kr'ita: labdha kr'i ta ku sha la sogs rnams la'ang ngo //
translated: From those, kṛti, labdha, kṛti, kuśala, etc.

original: dus las s'a dhu pu shya ta: pa tsya m'a na rnams la'o //
analyzed: dus las s'a dhu pu shya ta: pa tsya m'a na rnams la'o //

analyzed: a'a shva: yu dzy'a las aupta la bu nya'o //

analyzed: br'ishma dang ba santa las yang na'o //

original: sbyin bya'i bu lon nyid do //
analyzed: sbyin bya'i bu lon nyid do //

original: ka l'a pi: aa shvattha: ya ba bu 'a las buna'o //🔽aa ba ra sam'a: br'ishma dag la bunya'o //
analyzed: ka l'a pi: aa shvattha: ya ba bu 'a las buna'o // aa ba ra sam'a: br'ishma dag la bunya'o //

analyzed: sambbat+sa ra: aa gra h'a la ni dag la thanya'ang ngo //

original: by'a ha ra ti mri ga la'o //
analyzed: by'a ha ra ti mri ga la'o //

original: aa sya so dham'o //
analyzed: aa sya so dham'o //

analyzed: dig sogs las byang ba la yang na'o / au da ky'a ta dang ra dza sva l'a la'o //

original: lus dang yang lag las so ;
analyzed: lus dang yang lag las so ;

analyzed: ; dri ti: kukshi ka la shi: basti: aasti: aa hi las dhanya'o //

analyzed: aanytsa dang gr'i b'a las so //

analyzed: ghri bh'i ra dang panytsa dza na las nya'o //

analyzed: tsa turm'as las mchod sbyin la'o //

analyzed: ming la aana'o //

analyzed: aanta: pu ri ka ming la'o //

analyzed: aa dhy'a hma sogs las so //

analyzed: di nal muma'o //

analyzed: karna las so //

analyzed: au pa: sngon ma las thaka'o //

analyzed: dz'a nu dang n'i p'i dag las so //

analyzed: 'chad byed dang bshad bya'i ming la @166a * //

analyzed: aada las kyang ngo //

analyzed: sth'a ma dang aa dzi na'i mtha'i las 'jig go //

analyzed: mchod sbyin rnams las mantra kalpa dag las so //

analyzed: rig aatsa du ma las si hi ta mi pa las thanya'o //

analyzed: ri shi las klog pa la'o //

analyzed: poo ro d'a sha dang pu rod'a sha las shi kana'o //

analyzed: ri ka aa ya na sogs rnams las aana'o //

analyzed: sdeb sbyor las yata'ang ngo //

analyzed: nga si'i a'a ma'i gnas las 'ongs pa la'o //

analyzed: shundi ka sogs las aana'o ;

original: / rig pa dang skye gnas kyi 'brel pa las punya'o //
analyzed: / rig pa dang skye gnas kyi 'brel pa las punya'o //

original: rita las thanya'o //
analyzed: rita las thanya'o //

original: pi tri las yata yang na'o //
analyzed: pi tri las yata yang na'o //

original: nri dang he tu rnams las r'u pya dang ma yat dag go //
analyzed: nri dang he tu rnams las r'u pya dang ma yat dag go //

original: go tra'i mtha' las de'i 'di bzhin no //
analyzed: go tra'i mtha' las de'i 'di bzhin no //

original: pra bha ba ti'o //
analyzed: pra bha ba ti'o //

original: bi du ra las nya'o //
analyzed: bi du ra las nya'o //

original: shi shu kranda sogs dang nad kyi dbang du byas nas krita grantha latstsha'o //
analyzed: shi shu kranda sogs dang nad kyi dbang du byas nas krita grantha latstsha'o //

original: dang gi don las de pa aa su ra sogs min pa las so //
analyzed: dang gi don las de pa aa su ra sogs min pa las so //

original: mang po la dbyi ba kun bshad la'o //
analyzed: mang po la dbyi ba kun bshad la'o //

original: su las 'di gnas pa las so //
analyzed: su las 'di gnas pa las so //

original: mngon par skye ba rnams las ri rnams las mtshon gyis 'tsho ba rnams la'o //🔽shandi ka la sogs rnams las nyya'o //
analyzed: mngon par skye ba rnams las ri rnams las mtshon gyis 'tsho ba rnams la'o // shandi ka la sogs rnams las nyya'o //

original: sindhu sogs las aana'o //
analyzed: sindhu sogs las aana'o //

original: tu d'i dharma t'i dag las dhanya'o //
analyzed: tu d'i dharma t'i dag las dhanya'o //

original: sha lanta ra las tshan 'o //
analyzed: sha lanta ra las tshan 'o //

original: ngi las gus pa tra la ma h'a r'a dza las thaka'o //
analyzed: ngi las gus pa tra la ma h'a r'a dza las thaka'o //

original: sems med las yul dus min pa las so //
analyzed: sems med las yul dus min pa las so //

original: b'a su de ba aardzu na las kana'o //
analyzed: b'a su de ba aardzu na las kana'o //

original: go tra las mang po la bunya'o //
analyzed: go tra las mang po la bunya'o //

original: rgyal rigs las so //
analyzed: rgyal rigs las so //

original: ljongs kyi ming las rigs kyi mtha' de bzhin du thams cad do //
analyzed: ljongs kyi ming las rigs kyi mtha' de bzhin du thams cad do //

original: t'a las bshad pa la'o //
analyzed: t'a las bshad pa la'o //

original: rig byed klog par byed pa la rig byed byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: rig byed klog par byed pa la rig byed byed pa nyid do //

original: tinti ri: ba ba tantu: khandi: / au kha la tstsha na'o //
analyzed: tinti ri: ba ba tantu: khandi: / au kha la tstsha na'o //

original: k'a shya ba: koo shi ka dag las drang srong gi rtogs pa la 'ang ni ni'o //
analyzed: k'a shya ba: koo shi ka dag las drang srong gi rtogs pa la 'ang ni ni'o //

original: shoo na ka la sogs pa rnams las so //
analyzed: shoo na ka la sogs pa rnams las so //

original: ka l'a bi bee shalpa ya na'i slob ma rnams las so //
analyzed: ka l'a bi bee shalpa ya na'i slob ma rnams las so //

original: ka tha tsa ra ka: las 'jig go //
analyzed: ka tha tsa ra ka: las 'jig go //

original: ka l'a pin las aana'o //
analyzed: ka l'a pin las aana'o //

original: tsha ga li no @166b dha la 'jig go //
analyzed: tsha ga li no @166b dha la 'jig go //

original: karmmanda kri sh'a shva dag las dge slong dang gar gyi mdo dag la ai ni'o //
analyzed: karmmanda kri sh'a shva dag las dge slong dang gar gyi mdo dag la ai ni'o //

original: p'a r'a shar++ya shi l'a li dag la ni ni'o //
analyzed: p'a r'a shar++ya shi l'a li dag la ni ni'o //

original: sngon gyi drang srong dang bram ze la'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi drang srong dang bram ze la'o //

original: rtog pa la'o //🔽srid srungs las aa n'a da la'o //🔽aa ke de shi de las tas la yang na'o //
analyzed: rtog pa la'o // srid srungs las aa n'a da la'o // aa ke de shi de las tas la yang na'o //

original: au ras las yata'o //🔽au pa dzny'a ta la'o //
analyzed: au ras las yata'o // au pa dzny'a ta la'o //

original: kri tala'o // ming la'o //
analyzed: kri tala'o // ming la'o //

original: b'a ta pa las aanya'o //
analyzed: b'a ta pa las aanya'o //

original: ku l'a la sogs la sa bunya'o //
analyzed: ku l'a la sogs la sa bunya'o //

original: de'i 'di la'o //
analyzed: de'i 'di la'o //

original: ra tha dang tad mtha' las yata'o //
analyzed: ra tha dang tad mtha' las yata'o //

original: b'a ha na sngon ma las aanya'o //
analyzed: b'a ha na sngon ma las aanya'o //

original: b'a ha na: aa dhva r++yu: pa ri sha da las kyang ngo //
analyzed: b'a ha na: aa dhva r++yu: pa ri sha da las kyang ngo //
